Got the washer and promptly took it outside to give it a whirl, it would run for about 10 seconds before shutting down and wouldn't turn on again for 15 minutes or so. Returned and ordered a different brand.

I did try it. It seems to work well. I am not sure about the plastic water quick disconnect. looks like it may get broke if you accidently bump it against something. I like the hose reel. Everything has a place so you don't have things hanging and stuck somewhere for storage. I think it is an ok unit, you will just have to be careful with it, since some of the plastic components wont take abuse.

I had another brand pressure washer that was nothing but trouble. This one, though, is great. It was easy to assemble, has a constant water flow, and stores neatly so it is ready to use again with no fuss (like looking for the attachments). I use it a couple of times a week to wash the cars, clean the deck and patio, the driveway and sidewalks, outdoor furniture -- endless uses!

reviews.review_header: Its good for cars but that's about it
reviews.review_text: The hose for the pressure washer is very short and very stiff. Its good for cars but that's about it.

reviews.review_header: This works pretty well once you get it connected to the hose ...
reviews.review_text: This works pretty well once you get it connected to the hose and don't move it around. The water hose connection is damn near the worse piece of engineering I have seen. It made if plastic and I estimate it's life expectancy to be under ten uses. Will look for metal replacement. The actual washer works good.
Weak, and I wish I could get my money back!

I was not sure if an electric power washer could replace my heavy duty gasoline unit but I took a chance anyway. I have used it twice, once to do the ceiling and siding on my porch at my country house and a week later to do the deck and columns, i was very impressed. The AR did a very good job the power was more than sufficient and the price was right. I may consider buying a second one for my regular home. I have already recommended the AR Blue to one of my friends.

reviews.review_header: So far I've used this for several days cleaning up ...
reviews.review_text: So far I've used this for several days cleaning up outside. I still need to learn more about it but so far it's what I expected. Doesn't leak as I 've read in the reviews. Ordered the brass fitting thinking it might leak but didn't need the fitting. I gave it 4 stars due to not using it enough to fully give it a 5.

reviews.review_header: but otherwise it's a great little machine
reviews.review_text: The hose reel is worthless, but otherwise it's a great little machine. It's exactly what I expected.

This machine is small but does a good job. Performs as expected. The only issue I have had is that I bought an extension hose to use with it and the AR383 has real issues trying to work with it. The hose is too long with the extension for it to keep up the pressure. The motor struggles. If you use it with everything in the box and nothing extra, you'll have no problems.

this is a really great pressure washer for the price. so far i have used in on my deck, fence, siding, cars, lawnmower, driveway and concrete steps. it has done a great job on all of my weekend projects. just remember you are not buying a commercial grade power washer so dont expect it to preform like one. with that being said i think this unit is more than adequate to perform the jobs needed by the everyday homeowner. i really dont think you can beat it for the price, the power washer is great, customer service is even better and the price is the best part. i would recommend this power washer to anyone and i would buy this product again.

reviews.review_header: Used 1x worked fine. plugged in to use second time and would ...
reviews.review_text: PIECE of *&^#!!!! Used 1x worked fine. plugged in to use second time and would not turn on. No replacement because past the return time table Terrible product.

reviews.review_header: Never wrote a review before. Displeased enough with unit to do so now.
reviews.review_text: Bought this P.W. In June. Hose real is worthless. Connections difficult and tend to leak. Worst is when I went to use it yesterday it stopped working. Appeared to overheat because water was impeeded by one of the connections. Unit will not start. Don't know if this unit has an internal circuit breaker, but getting of repeated issues. Nice color though.

Used this to wash our stamped concrete patio before applying an acrylic sealer and it worked flawlessly. Not sure about what others have noted about leaks or poor engineering -- I did not have ANY leaks, amd the wand maintained an tight, focused jet throughout the entire process. It stripped away moss and accumulated dirt from all the crevices while keeping constant pressure without interruption. Highly recommended for home use and consumer-grade projects. Bottom line: NO REGRETS.

reviews.review_header: AR 383 did a good job and did not leak......
reviews.review_text: Ordered this blue clean ar383 from Store123 thru Amazon. Item arrived extremely fast. Hooked it up today and used it on my drive for about 2 hours. It DID NOT leak one drop and did a very good job of preparing the drive for sealer. Time will tell how if it will continue as is, but right now I'm a happy camper.

reviews.review_header: ... gas powered power washer and although it was a good product, I did not use it enough to ...
reviews.review_text: I used to own a gas powered power washer and although it was a good product, I did not use it enough to keep it running properly. I researched "best electric power washers" and found the AR Blue Clean. I love it. I power washed my deck and fence, it paid for itself in one use. You can not go wrong with this purchase.

reviews.review_header: Love this machine because it's small enough that getting to ...
reviews.review_text: Love this machine because it's small enough that getting to it and using it is a breeze. Much better for my light home needs (garage, back patio, etc) than a gas powered one. Had an issue with one machine, but customer service was great in helping resolve the problem. Would recommend.

Seems to work fine. Lighter than the one it was replacing but works as well. 2 HELPFUL HINTS FOR OTHER BUYERS: 1) The power cord plug has a built in ground fault and unit will not power up if you plug the outlet you are using is ground-fault protected. 2) The plastic male thread fitting appeared to be 3/4 inch pipe threaded, but actually it is metric. I was attempting to replace the plastic fittings with brass fittings and found that this did not work.

reviews.review_header: Great price...very happy with the washer.
reviews.review_text: Used it for the first time yesterday. Wow! It is so much quieter than my old power washer (different manufacturer). Plenty powerful for my concrete walkway and stone porch.

This pressure washer has great output, and is very easy to connect to the garden hose. The only negative is that the hose reel is sort of difficult to use. I wish there was a way to roll/store the pressure hose while connected. Even unconnected, the roll was awkward, and seemed to want to crimp the hose. I leave it disconnected most of the time.

I like this machine! I've always used a Karcher in the past but after having two of them break down I decided to try this one. It's much quieter than the Karcher and it does a great job. It's daily light and compact which makes it easy to store. I found the pressure to be more than adequate for driveway and patio cleaning, If you have any unstable painted areas watch out it'll clean it right off. I recommend this machine.

reviews.review_header: Never rent a pressure washer again!
reviews.review_text: Very easy to use and effective! It's more than sufficient for residential use. Once you start using it, you'll look for more things to power wash. So far I've used it to wash my house's siding, and my deck.

The pressure is good, but it is almost impossible to get the attachments off. I've tried the tips that the book said to do. Nothing should be that hard to get apart. If that were corrected, I would like it.

reviews.review_header: This is an awesome power washer
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome power washer. I have gone through three pressure washers in the last few years of various brands. This one looks like it will last and it comes with a great warranty too.

reviews.review_header: Great product for cleaning cars and patios/ porches
reviews.review_text: Great product for cleaning cars and patios/ porches. Advise, tho it is electric 1900 PSI is quite powerful. Ripped paint right off my porch and cursh tar that was laid down almost a year go. Wish that the foam canon attachment was free tho, the little tank it comes with is pure trash.

It arrived quickly . It works great! I had a smaller one to do another deck and it took forever! This has a lot of power, the hose is sturdy, nothing leaks. My son and son-in-law were very impressed. It's light enough to carry(I forget it has wheels) and everything stays right on the attachment holder so there is no "looking" for pieces. I would recommend this to anyone. A few months later, it still works great, but now does leak at the water connector. Still a great buy!

reviews.review_header: Good Choice for a Reasonably Powerful Electric PW!
reviews.review_text: Light enough to move around easily. Powerful enough to clean the deck and handle most household tasks. Any more and it would seriously damage things if your not careful. I like the fact that I don't have another gas powered piece of equipment to maintain. There are two heads, one of which has a rotating cone of spray that does a good job on the deck in prep for staining.

reviews.review_header: Light weight and easy to use but couldn't get an adequate pressure to ...
reviews.review_text: Light weight and easy to use but couldn't get an adequate pressure to do a big job like the driveway. Had to use fine spray which takes to long. Did work good on siding.

Fantastic for convenience. Have used it several times on small jobs and worked well for what I wanted. There are times I want a larger PSI, and will use a gas unit, but for 90% of what I want to do, this is the perfect size. I do have the same problem with the water input leaking, but only a small irritation and not enough to lower the rating.
Nice unit, EXCEPT the water hose adapter is so cheap it broke the second use when barely moving it.

Cheap plastic parts (most likely around the seal) on the nozzle. It was great for the first 1 hour of use. Afterwards, the pressure disappeared. It looks like that one of the plastic components broke and is probably easily fixable. However, something like this should not happen in the first place.

reviews.review_header: I would have saved money if I bought it locally.
reviews.review_text: I've used it 3 times and it worked very well. I had thought that if I bought anything on Amazon that I would save money rather than buy it locally. I proved myself wrong in my thinking. If I had waited 3 days I could have saved $20 if I bought it locally. Since then the price dropped another $20. Don't assume Amazon or any other places will always save you money. Poor timing on my part.

reviews.review_header: I had to return it. Something's wrong electrically. ...
reviews.review_text: I had to return it. Something's wrong electrically. It won't stay on for more than a second. A pain to put it all together and then have to box it and take it to UPS.
Bought for my husband and he loved it. Said it was powerful and washed the deck and fence.
Defective motor mechanism: put out less pressure than a garden hose nossle. Annoying assembly that could have been done at the factory. Maybe yours will work; mine is worthless.

I just received it today. I followed the "quick start" directions for set up. Assembly was pretty easy and I had it unpacked and tried it out in about 20 minutes. The plastic hose connector makes me nervous, but I'll keep that in mind when using the washer and hope it holds up over time. Definately no comparison to my gas pressure washer, but I didn't expect it to be. I think it will work well for small quick jobs with the easy, quick set up.

Rated it a 4 only because I wish it were more power full. I like the machine it works well for my FL use. The reel is a good way to store the hose. For my summer home in NC I purchased a Snow Joe Sun Joe SPX3000. It has more pressure 2030 PSI but more important it has a higher flow rate 1.76 GPM and a more powerfull pump.

reviews.review_header: Never be afraid to powerwash anything!
reviews.review_text: This was a great investment. The 1900 PSI is more than enough for a weekend warrior doing house maintenance. Easy to set up and use. Lightweight so I can carry it up and down the deck stairs. The tubing from the spray nozzle to the machine is a little cumbersome but definitely not a deal breaker. Just finished the deck and concrete patio. Siding next and then blasting paint off old shutters.
The washer constantly cycles to the pressure mode. Off and on Off and On. thought it was my water pressure but my other washers work fine. Don't think this is a deal.

reviews.review_header: Very poor quality. I will not purchase another AR product
reviews.review_text: The water intake connection leaks but I could have lived with that. The first time I started the washer the pressure hose split a seam. Very poor quality. I will not purchase another AR product.

reviews.review_header: only bother if you want something you'll need to fix often
reviews.review_text: I purchased this less than a year ago - i used it one season and it worked GREAT - after I made my own connection for the water line (b/c the manufactured one leaked horribly) but then something happened that the water gushes out of the spray handle - I ordered and replaced the o-rings - but it's still useless.

So far so good. It's just right for what I need. It is a little weak on concrete but they say only gas ones are enough for that. I use this for the car, the vinyl siding, and my solar panels! I bought a MTM hydro foam lance, and a special adapter and it works well for that. I do have to say that I lowered it to 3 stars simply because of the locking mechanism, and incompatibilities with attachments. That part is very disappointing.

Great household pressure washer. Perfect for those small jobs around the house. Just enough pressure to clean the driveway and sidewalks. The nozzle adjustment helps to adjust the pressure for the delicate painted surfaces.

I've used this about 5 times now, a couple hours each time, to clean my badly stained concrete patio, parking area and drive. So far no leaking or other problems. It's not as powerful as larger ones, of course, but does a good job. When first turned on, was confused by the motor coming on and then stopping. Learned that it's activated by the gun trigger. Wish the gun would lock in the on position, but realize that's probably a safety issue.
This machine has a lot of power and does the same job a more expensive one would do. Love it.

reviews.review_header: Finally an easy to use pressure washer
reviews.review_text: I put my gas pressure washer away and don't plan to use it the future This is a great pressure washer, great 2 speed pressure setting, long power cord makes it safer to use around water

Have a gas powered one, but being a women, have a difficult time with getting them started. I find the gas ones to be hard to start, loud and in reality a pain........so got this electric as I have sold all gas run machines. I used this to clean my teak chairs and rocker, was a breeze, very quite and powerful enough to get the job done. No muss, No fuss.....Plan on using it on my deck this fall.

This is my 3rd power washer. The first two were cheap junk and broke. This one is entirely different. Very powerful and compact, it's also easy to use. Same price as a different brand at Costco but this unit is more powerful (1700 PSI vs 1900 PSI). First time use was for several hours non-stop on a redwood deck. Unit worked beautifully. Only gripe is the hose reel windup which doesn't work readily with the fitting at the end of the hose. I would definitely recommend this washer.

not as powerful as I was anticipating but gets the job done for my use. I tried to use it on the deck and it could work for that but would take a long time. Using it for washing cars is fantastic. Only complaint is that the hose feels like it's cheap hard plastic as opposed to rubberized.

I have a gasoline pressure washer for fences, driveways, etc., but this is kept exclusively for cleaning my porcelain tile deck. It has a sand cast type finish and this is both lightweight and yet powerful enough to clean debris from the crevices. I've had ones from home Depot, etc., but they never lasted more than 2 or 3 cleanings. I researched well before selecting this model. I am very pleased with it.

This unit works perfectly and does what it is supposed to do. Be sure to follow directions when assembling to avoid leak issues mentioned by other reviewers. My only complaint would be the hose reel; using it to store the hose results in a hose that is wound in too tight a circle and becomes very hard to straighten out. Solution: just loosely wrap the house around the handle and hang over the front of the machine- forget about the reel.

reviews.review_header: Horrible only lasted a few months
reviews.review_text: Worked great until it broke after only a few uses.

Easy to assemble pictures show hose wound on reel on machine..no idea how they accomplished that the hose is rigid and I could not get it wrapped around the reel ...but worked well..only used X1 but worked well...
so far it works great

Everything works very well. I have used it to wash the windows, both cars, clean the driveway, and the siding on the house. I have never had a leak. It is sometimes difficult to undo the hose from the unit but that is only due to the placement of the connection. Overall great item.

Love this pressure washer. Powerful as the gas ones, but a lot lighter, lower price, and simple to set up and take apart. I will never buy another gas powered one and have to worry about what type of gas to use, changing oil, carborator etc.
Nice and easy to use
Best little electric power washer offered. First day power washed two barns 8 solid hours.

reviews.review_header: Works great, exactly as described by other thorough reviewers
reviews.review_text: Works great, exactly as described by other thorough reviewers. Just one word of caution: the plastic hose attachment is so bad and weak, it is ridiculous.. So I recommend purchasing the metal attachment which is very inexpensive and available via Amazon as well.

reviews.review_header: AR BLUE CLEAN AR383 PRESSURE CLEANER
reviews.review_text: I DID A LOT OF RESEARCH ONLINE BEFORE MAKING THIS PURCHASE! LIKE SOME OTHERS REVIEWING THIS PRODUCT, THE HIGH PRESSURE HOSE IS A BIT STIFF! I DECIDED TO USE THE STORAGE REEL FOR THE POWER CORD AND JUST COIL THE HOSE AND HANG IT OVER THE UNIT. THE UNIT SEEMS VERY ADEQUATE FOR AROUND THE HOME CLEANING! I'VE ONLY USED IT ONCE SO FAR AND IT DID A GOOD JOB! COMPARED WITH THE OTHER UNITS I RESEARCHED ONLINE, THIS UNIT HAD A LOT BETTER RATINGS AND ITS EASY TO USE AND STORE.

Well I must say the reviews were right on point. It's a decent product that can be improved upon. Go to Home Depot and get the brass male to male hose connector. This well lessen some of the water leakage from the front of the washer. All in all it's a decent product that got the job done.

Love this machine. Have used it to clean so many things around the house I do not know how I ever lived without a power washer. It is quiet and I find it powerful enough for what I need it for. Cleans concrete back to like-new condition. Cleans siding, my pergola, fence, car, wheels, etc. My only complaint is when using it, if you release the trigger, you have to wait a second before pressing it again. No big deal once you get used to it.

Works well and as expected. If I had room, I would buy a gas powered one, but this does the job. Like others, the connection leaks. I may have to buy a brass set. I did buy it on a flash sale. I would not pay full price for this item.

reviews.review_header: He said that it works very nicely for what we need
reviews.review_text: I haven't personally been able to use this yet but my husband has. He said that it works very nicely for what we need. (Used to clean outside of the house)
Build of cheap plastic. A bump at a connection and it is over. This power washer lasted one season. I kept it in a heated garage over the winter; regardless, the pump failed the 2nd season.

reviews.review_header: Good product but wheels aren't as good for moving it ...
reviews.review_text: Good product but wheels aren't as good for moving it around as we thought they'd be. But the way it works is fine.

I have owned this machine for about 2 months and agree with the other posts that the hose connection is awful. I bought the brass fittings, in fact, I have tried several different types of fittings and nothing has worked well. The design is also poor as the pipe connection into the machine is recessed and prevents the fittings from being tightened snuggly. Pressure washer works well, the hose connections are terrible

If you want a good pressure washer for the money this is the one to get. I received it opened the box.All parts there put it together used it on my house. Did not leak one drop of water at hose connection to the unit. Worked Awesome!!! I would buy again. And its great on washing your car too! P.S Don't waist your money on the other ones you will just have problems.

I used this for cleaning my privacy fence and side walks. Cleaned very well. More powerful than I expected. PROS: Powerful. Good power wand and regular power wand. CONS: The power plug is a bit large for my outside outlets. I have to use an adapter to fit it into my outdoor outlet.

Overall....Great Machines. Good price, good pressure. Minus one star from the hose reel, because it's not as easy as you think to put it back when finish. First time in my life, I really mean it!!! First time in my life I was looking for instructions or youtube to figure out how to use the reel, but I can't find it anywhere nor internet. So good luck on it!!! Washer works awsome, that's why I still give four star. It would be great if they have some improvement on the reel in futures.

I've used it twice with excellent results. It is easy to use and the set up was simple. I had another washer from a major manufacturer and while it lasted for years and did a good job, this is easier to carry/roll and is smaller in size, making it easier to store. I like the spray bottle feature as my other washer had a small hose you had to put in the detergent. Overall this has the right combination of power and portability most home owners would need.

only used it once so far to clean concrete walkway. included nozzles do not have a wide enough coverage and still clean at high power. The supplied nozzles are good for 3"-4" diameter coverage at high power. Apparently they sell a separate deck/patio nozzle for this. I haven't purchased it yet. Otherwise it was easy to assemble and use. It's tricky to start it, but help is available in the troubleshooting section.

I had hoped for a bit more with this power washer. The connectors are in very awkward places on the machine. My husband has large hands and it is frustrating to capture the connector on the back and secure for use. The water does leak from the connector, but not enough to cause a big problem. Power is okay as are the attachments. Just disappointed in the ease of use factor.
What a nice surpise this power washer was and continues to be. After years of dealing with gas powered hard to store power washers I bought this on Amazon. It will not disappoint.

reviews.review_header: Best performance I think you can expect from an electric.3
reviews.review_text: Works great, have used it to do the deck, driveway, sidewalk, and starting on the siding. Only a four rating since the power just isn't strong enough for quick work, so it takes several passes for each area.

This machine works alright for what it is, but I do wish I'd gone with a different brand. Soon after my return period was past, the pump started fluctuating providing inconsistent pressure and running continuously after I release the trigger. Not sure what the issue is - no leaks or kinks and water pressure from spicket is good. No I get to go through the manufacturer and see what they say - yeah. Just what I wanted to do with my time.

reviews.review_header: Great little pressure washer, especially for the price.
reviews.review_text: A great little pressure washer for cleaning up decks, siding and the sidewalk. It is not too noisy, the wand is easy to maneuver where you want. It cleans up moss like a champ.

reviews.review_header: very bad quality, don't buy this
reviews.review_text: We bought this 3 months ago and its already broke, very bad quality, don't buy this. now its saying i can't send the product back as its been more than a month since we bought the washer.

Nice high quality equipment. Goes together quite easily with easy to follow instructions. Even without the instructions the assembly would be intuitive. Pressure is quite good - no problems with operation. I tried to use this equipment to clean the fins of the HVAC central home heat pump. BIG MISTAKE The water pressure was more than enough to fold back the fins. So I will have to straighten the fins next summer.

I bought this for my husband for Fathers day last year. It had worked fine but just this week while he was using it, it started to lose power and then smoke came out of it and it blew up. Unfortunately the year warranty is over. Wouldn't buy this product again.

reviews.review_header: Works fine for around the house usage
reviews.review_text: Works fine for around the house usage. Doesn't work quite as well as a stronger gas powered pressure washer but is much more convenient to use and I'm happy with the results around the house.

I read the reviews and was told to buy a double female adapter made out of brass because the plastic adapter doesn't work that well, but it seems the adapter I bought leaked like a seive. The machine worked okay. Stalled out on me a few times, Im not sure why. I would squeeze the trigger on it and it would rev up but nothing would come out. Frustrating. I would say spend a few more bucks and get one thats a little better.

reviews.review_header: Does Great Job, Lightweight, Easy to Use
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this power washer. Cleaned my deck, driveway and walkways beautifully. Very easy to use. Also, I haven't had any issues with the hose attachment that so many reviews say leaks badly . . . maybe because I always use teflon at the joint.
I love this. NO complaints. I have put this thing to use over the last several weeks, and it doesn't beg for mercy. Takes it like a champ and asks for more! :) Absolutely pleased with this purchase.

reviews.review_header: It did leak where the hose was attached like several other people noted on the reviews
reviews.review_text: I tried this out just a short time when I purchased it, due to the weather haven't got to use it very much. It did leak where the hose was attached like several other people noted on the reviews. Hopefully can be tightened when I am ready to do my actual jobs that I am wanting to use it for.

I went into this purchase with extremely low expectations, given many of the previous reviews. In fact, I would say that I've never been less excited or hopeful about a purchase on Amazon. But after one use, I can't find anything to complain about. Right out of the box, it seemed to work fine, with no leaks from anywhere - and I mean not even a drop. I used it for over two hours, cleaning my disgusting deck and patio furniture. There was plenty of power to spare for these tasks, with no signs of overheating. So far, so good.

reviews.review_header: Girls can work it so watch out men your job is in danger.
reviews.review_text: I wished it took off algae but it doesn't around the pool area. Cleans dirt okay. I have not tried with a cleaner yet so we will see if that helps. Good price, seems like it is well made.

I would highly recommend this product. It cleaned our outdoor furniture easily (although for tough dirt we will do again with a cleaner added to water). The apparatus is not bulky and easy to use. The flow of water isn't as hard as I thought...I do wish it was a little more forceful...but better safe than sorry. I would recommend this power washer for home use...decks, sidewalks, siding, and outdoor furniture-it worked well for all for me.

reviews.review_header: Did a great job the first two times
reviews.review_text: Did a great job the first two times...then a small piece of plastic broke which rendered it completely unusable. Fortunately, Amazon immediately issued a full refund. Thank you, Amazon!

reviews.review_header: Works well with plenty of pressure. My complaint is ...
reviews.review_text: Works well with plenty of pressure. My complaint is that it that the form isn't designed well and it takes a lot of time for setup and take down. With a few improvements you wouldn't have could leave the hose attached and the power cord wouldn't be in the way.

Recommended by http://www.pressurewashercritics.com/ . Great electric power washer! First used to clean an entire tennis/sport court and all the grates. High quality through and through. Connector to hose leaks a little but fixed with rubber gasket. No nearly as loud as gas powered.

Like this power washer, compact and easy to maneuver. Does a great job! What I don't like, when reeling up power hose on wheel it kinks the hoseline which in the future could cause problems. So I just roll it up and hang it on the handle, also I agree with other owners, the coupler that connects to garden hose should be metal not plastic.But would recommend this product!

After receiving a defective product, I sent it back and received a different unit. Used it twice last summer. Just took it out to use it again for a third time and it's totally dead. Tried trouble-shooting and nothing. Of course the return period has expired. What a waste of $150.

reviews.review_header: Works great, I was concerned about leaking garden hose connector
reviews.review_text: Works great, I was concerned about leaking garden hose connector, but decided to wait and see before buying the brass connector. The directions say to limit the water pressure to 150 psi or below, a rv water pressure regulator which I have on my hose to protect my rv plumbing will do this just fine. No leaks, just as it is designed to do.

Works great. Enough power to clean the floors of our boat just fine. (Maybe not enough power to effectively clean our parrot's cage though.) Light enough to pick up and carry, too. We have notice absolutely no leaks either. Definitely a really good buy for a quite reasonable price.
Excellent pressure sprayer. Easy to use and store.
Good power washer for the price. I did my front landscape stones, sidewalks and backyard paver patio with this. Nice job.
Works great for cleaning my sailboat, also works very well on the car, but if you use this on the car and have any decals, be sure to stand back about 4 feet, or it will peel off the decals.

reviews.review_header: One of the better electric pressure washers on the market
reviews.review_text: One of the better electric pressure washers on the market. Impressive pressure for an electric machine. One big negative is the location for the water source to connect to; on the rear near the bottom with very little room for my hand to fit to screw the hose on.

reviews.review_header: Restore your Fence without the cost
reviews.review_text: Purchased this item so I could power wash our fence - took 2 days to complete - in the end our fence looked brand new- highly recommend

After reading some of the comments about leaks I was hesitant. I assembled the washer right away and connected it to water and YEP, it leaked like mad! Decided to try reading instructions. Yep, I assembled the water supply fitting backward. Reversed it and NO leaks! Fired it up and everything works great! Amazing about those instructions!

reviews.review_header: Cleaning a pool deck with the AR pressure washer
reviews.review_text: I bought this pressure washer since I didn't want a gas powered unit. My deck around the pool is Koolcrete and was last cleaned 6 years ago. I was afraid I was going to need to have it resurfaced or change it to something else. I used the AR Blue Clean and was really pleased with the job that it did. The pool deck looks like new. The pressure washer was easy to use and to store after I finished. It should be just what I need to clean the vinyl trim and gutters around my one story brick ranch.

reviews.review_header: With the great reviews on this product I was expecting to write ...
reviews.review_text: With the great reviews on this product I was expecting to write a 5 STAR review but 4 stars is what I'm giving because there is always room for improvement. There are a few things that can updated but I'm not going to complain because the product does the job.

reviews.review_header: Great unit especially for the price
reviews.review_text: I've had this unit for 1 month and have used it to power wash my patio, house and the garage floor. Its more than powerful enough to handle all of these tasks. Unit is small and quiet. Like others have said get the brass hose connection. Also mentioned by other reviewers is that the hose is too stiff and hard to manage. These two gripes aside this is a great pressure washer.

reviews.review_header: Leaky Unit in a Drought restricted State
reviews.review_text: The unit was replaced twice and with each "new" unit it leaked at the inlet fittings. We are in a severe drought in California so we cant be wasting any water.
Did my first job the driveway and i love the way it turned out! The water cord and the electrical cords seem to be a hassle to put away other than that this was perfect for my use!
Storage is a joke. The engineering on this product atrocious. You have to resemble/disassemble every time you use it... Cheap breakable parts as well

Have used this pressure washer several times now. Washed concrete patio....about two hours of work. Washed about 75 feet of sidewalk....about 2.5hrs work. Washed shed siding about 1 hour of work. Washed back side of my home which took about 3 hours. All jobs came out excellent and the unit is working great. Not one problem. Would recommend.

reviews.review_header: Nice machine but not as powerful as I had hoped ...
reviews.review_text: Nice machine but not as powerful as I had hoped it would be. We had had a 1350 psi machine which broke and I really thought washing the deck with a 1900 psi would make a big difference and it did not. It wokrs nicely tho and is not as noisy as the old one was.

I was kind of skeptical about buying an electric pressure washer but I have changed my mind since using this one. I like how it is quiet and there are not exhaust fumes. I used it for 4 hours straight and never had any issues. It did a good job at cleaning all of my concrete. I also used it to strip some of the paint up from my concrete patio so I can repaint it. I will be using it again before long to clean my fence so I can stain it.

I am very pleased with this pressure washer. I thought I wanted a gas engine pressure washer because of the higher pressures, but after much research I decided on this AR Blue Clean AR383 1900psi electric pressure washer and I am very pleased with the amount of pressure without having to deal with gas, oil, fumes, and noise. My Dad had a pressure washer just a few years ago and the motor ran the entire time. I am impressed with the new design, where the motor turns off when the wand trigger is released. This will save much wear and tear on the electric motor.

reviews.review_header: I bought this back in February, I have only ...
reviews.review_text: I bought this back in February, I have only used it a few times and it just quit on me. Lost power in the middle of use. I have checked and cleaned everything. Nothing!

I bought this a year ago now and when I first started, it was a good amount of pressure. Before long, the hose connecting to the gun started leakingso bad I can't use it. I will need a new gun to replace this. I have only used this machine 7-8 times for light work. Should come with better parts.

I was afraid this wouldn't have the power of the gas powered pressure washer, but thankfully I was wrong. This machine was so easy to use and really did a fabulous job! If I had to add a minor con...its the cords. The electrical cord and the "gun" hose got wrapped around each other and the outdoor hose. I would perhaps make the 2 of them different colors?

reviews.review_header: Did a great job at washing off the stain in the walkway
reviews.review_text: Used this pressure washer on the first weekend it arrived. Did a great job at washing off the stain in the walkway, the crud on the old pick up's wheels (including the bad paint job on the steel wheels,.. oops). Love it. No leaks, powerful.

I needed a pressure washer for cleaning my sidewalks and driveway. All my "tool guys" told me I needed a gas powered model. I sure didn't want or need another gas powered piece of equipment to store and maintain. The AR Blue Clean AR383 does just what I wanted and needed. For the money, it can't be beat. I eventually elected to buy a 25 foot, 10 amp extension cord to extend the reach of the pw and that arrangement works fine as well.

The product is great but you definitely need to take the time to read the difficult manual. Once you put it together, it works great. It is lightweight but powerful to clean decks, backyards, fences, car wheels, etc... Good quality, great value!

reviews.review_header: This little thing works pretty good. strong and easy to set up
reviews.review_text: This little thing works pretty good. strong and easy to set up. The hose real is a total joke. dont even bother with that. only works if you disconnect the hose completely. I removed it and added a couple pvc holders to the sides. Works much better.

reviews.review_header: Why rent when you can buy?
reviews.review_text: This little pressure washer has all of the utility of the industrial versions I've rented in the past. I used it to blow right through the gunk that accumulated on my patio and deck, leaving everything looking like new. This unit has plenty of power and performed flawlessly. At price point, I couldn't have asked for more.
I have had this pressure washer for a little over a year. O rings needed to be changed so I did it but now it won't start at all... I am going to go with another brand.

reviews.review_header: good to having this washing machine
reviews.review_text: I decided to make a order this type after reviewed a few of comments in amazon, the performance really powerful and easy to control after more 1 month of use, Now I enjoy washing my car anytime when I need

reviews.review_header: AR Blue Clean Pressure Washer - Outstanding!
reviews.review_text: This is the first pressure washer I've ever owned. I've debated buying a gasoline powered unit, but didn't want to spend the money. I've only used this one 4 times now, but I can't imagine how I got along without it I've cleaned the house siding, the grill and the lawn tractor - twice. It works flawlessly and is much more than I expected. I can recommend it highly. http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B002Z8E52Y/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_title
I've only used it once so far, but I'm very pleased. It did a great job cleaning the limestone patio. I am anticipating that it will perform well on other cleaning projects around the house.

This unit works great. It is light and easy to carry and move around. I like that it came with 2 different ends. So far I used this to pressure wash my garage before painting, washing the siding on my house and also for washing the concrete decking around my pool. Like others have posted I bought the metal union for the water inlet, and even using that it would leak unless you keep it tight. Overall great product and I would buy it again.

Ordered this after reading other's reviews and after putting 3-4 hours on the AR I feel qualified to write a review. Simple to operate, lightweight, surprising 1900 psi did a good job on my son's deck. About the only negative is the plastic coupling system from the power washer nozzle hose to the power washer, it's weak but am on my way to my local hardware store to get a brass coupling that others have talked about in their reviews.

reviews.review_header: It's so small it was kinda like a toy and I didn't like the tool caddy
reviews.review_text: I used this washer for a total of about 2 hours and it quit working. It's so small it was kinda like a toy and I didn't like the tool caddy, the tools didn't want to stay put. AR customer support was very helpful, so I returned it and got a Ryobi that I like ALOT better!

I did a bit of research before deciding to purchase this one. I"m glad I did because the brand carried at our local "big box store" (H.D.) had reviews indicating there were a lot of problems with it. This one arrived very promptly, in perfect condition and I saved about $15 over buying it from (H.D.). It worked great once I figured out that you need to reset the switch on the plug when it's plugged in. It clean up the oil on our driveway very nicely. (the main reason I got it) Also used it to pressure wash my truck floor mats. very happy.

reviews.review_header: Light weight, fits together nicely and did the job.
reviews.review_text: Used this once and it all fits into a nice package and is lighter weight than the Husky I borrowed from a friend. Easy to carry down to basement during winter months so I don't have to worry about any freezing and water in the lines. I washed down the siding on the house and the cars. It worked like a charm. I know this review is only after using it once, but if it keeps up like this, it deserves the 5 star rating.

reviews.review_header: bloody useless. I spent hours trying to get enough pressure ...
reviews.review_text: Absolutely, bloody useless. I spent hours trying to get enough pressure out of it to wash a car...let alone pressure wash decking, siding, or my sidewalks. Returned within days.

This little machine (as big as my vaccume cleaner) is amazing, smart engineering every where, their team went above and beyond to make it a comfortable product to use, I use it to wash my car, it is so powerful that can peal off all the birds drippings and if you live is SoCal you need to know these damn dropping aint gonna come off in a normal car wash, they are responsible for my wiper damage every year

In the one month since I've purchased my Pressure Washer, I've blasted off twenty years of grime from my concrete walkways (They almost look like new!); I've stripped old varnish stains and the weathered-wood look from my backyard deck (It hasn't looked this good in ten years!); and I've cleaned my house's brick and aluminum siding. The garage floor is my next project. The Pressure Washer is well worth the price even if you use it only once; and two neighbors have already borrowed it. Highly recommended!

Don't waste your money, this will only work for a couple of times and then the motor starts smoking. The company replaced it once, and it did the same thing, smoked, and quit working, after 2 uses. Bought my husband a Honda, and what a great difference in products.

Not wanting to spend a lot of money for something I only use several times a year, I purchased this based on other positive reviews. I have now recommended it to everyone I know! I am so glad I not only have the ease of going to my own garage to use it(rather than borrowing from a neighbor) but the ease of using it makes it fun! Great product! And another excellent delivery timeframe from Amazon. I selected the free shipping timeframe on a Saturday, received it on Monday. There is no other way to shop!

Great product. Plenty of power to pressure wash all the green mold off our siding (and it's a huge house!). Easy to use and maneuver around because of long cord and power spray hose. As reported by other reviewers, the storage space for the hose (reel) is not very useful and the wrap around for the electric cord also not too useful. You do not need the male to male attachment that some have recommended as they have fixed that problem and it does not leak any water. Very satisfied with this investment so far!

reviews.review_header: Wasn't happy with this power washer at all
reviews.review_text: Wasn't happy with this power washer at all. It leaked real bad and the it just quit working. Don't waiste ur money.

reviews.review_header: I am quite satisfied with the performance
reviews.review_text: I used the power wash for three days on my patio and my driveway and other stones in my backyard. I am quite satisfied with the performance. Everything is very clean. I will probably use in in about four months. I have no complaints whatsoever. It's a very good cleaner and the power is perfect for me.

reviews.review_header: A great pressure washer for most uses!
reviews.review_text: Wow, it is so great to get a pressure washer that lives up to it's promise. This the best squirt gun ever...I mean this playing with water, the universal solvent is really fun. I say this as a 64 yr old male. I recommend getting the extended warranty as these devices don't last forever. By the way Gas powered units fail often.

I love this pressure washer, it is light and powerful but mine stopped working after a year. When I called AR North America they immediately sent me a new one. I was very impressed by their customer service, hopefully this one will last longer

reviews.review_header: After a little trouble at first it is an okay unit...
reviews.review_text: First one came and did not work at all. Amazon immediately replaced the unit. Second came and is a little under-powered for what I expected. But I guess being an electric unit versus a gas, that is to be expected.

reviews.review_header: AR Blue Clean AR383 1,900 PSI 1.5 GPM
reviews.review_text: The GFI plug would not stay on, so I called and had another plug sent to me. The plug trips real easy and because of this you have a hard time using an extension cord. The customer service person also told me if you have old wiring in your home it will not work. Washer worked as expected but I did purchase the Gilmour 7FHS7FH Double Female Swivel Brass Connector, 3/4-Inch by 3/4-Inch, coupling to keep water from leaking.

For an electric pressure washer.. this is grate, I just used only 2 times.. just got it this week. Good for the clean up around the house, not very noisy, did not see the leak many people have mentioned here, but the connectors are plastic, I wish it was copper, also the pipe was rubber, it is some sort of plastic and it is hard to use it, but does the job well

reviews.review_header: READ THE SMALL PRINT: "STORE INDOORS"! If you ...
reviews.review_text: READ THE SMALL PRINT: "STORE INDOORS"! If you store it in the garage over a cold winter it will ruin the pump. This is a major design flaw, IMHO.
Perfect for what I needed.

I bought this for my lake house and have used it a couple of times to wash my boat and the deck around my lake house. It's pretty sturdy and works well. I'm a little concerned about the plastic quick connect, but it hasn't broke yet.

I was pleasantly surprised by how well the power washer worked. I was able to clean up 2 years' accumulation of dirt and grime on my deck just as easily as if I had rented a gas-powered washer from Home Depot and at 1/2 the cost, plus now I have my own washer. Looking forward to tackling more projects. By the way, I experienced none of the problems with leaks where the hose joins the machine or with the hose which runs from the machine to the wand which were described in another review,

Used this once on my house siding. It did clean well. The following year I set this up to use on my deck and the hand hose leaked and I couldn't find the problem. So it is sitting in my garage. Right now I'm disappointed, but will try again when summer comes around again to find the problem.

This was easily put together but it's cheap plastic parts. Wheel fell off during assembly and then rolling in grass fell off again. The hose supplied easily kinks. This product would prob be best used in an area where it is not moved much like a carport or deck. The hose connectors are cheap. It cannot be rolled with a hose connected it will break off connectors. Again, I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone who is doing more than washing your car.

I didn't have the 5 screws needed to attach the rear caddy, so I called the ph# on the directions booklet provided. I was happy to get awesome support, including a bonus bottle of lubricant to keep the inside stuff happy. Great service!!!!

Use for cleaning for cars and it does great. Cleans concrete sidewalks and dumpsters. Now it does not have serious pressure so dont think your buying 4k psi machine for nothing, this is a light duty pressure washer!

Great for the money. I have used my washer on a variety of things outside the house. Each job was easier than the one before as I got even more proficient with set up, wash down and pack up. Best birthday gift I've bought myself in years.

reviews.review_header: A great pressure washer- AR Blue Clean
reviews.review_text: The AR Blue Clean (AR383) is a very effective pressure washer for most home owners. I used it on a large cedar deck and several planter boxes thereon as well as two large cedar free standing planter boxes. It took no more than half the time that it took for the five years before using a slightly less powerful pressure washer. It was so easy to use that I am looking forward to using it on my concrete driveway. To top it off, it was at a very good Amazon price.

I ordered this powerwasher after reading the reviews on Amazon.com. I bought this especially to get the mold off my trek deck, and it does the job beautifully, One feature I wish it had would be a lock to keep it on while using, as your hand does get tired after holding it awhile. I like that it is lightweight and delivers nice power stream of water.

Read all reviews and decided to buy based upon them. Here's what I found. The pressure hose can be left attached to the high pressure outlet and still wound on the reel or conversely, the wand can be left attached and the hose wound onto the reel by starting with the other end of the hose. I prefer to leave the hose attached to the outlet. Concerning the connector, while it is plastic, it works very well as long as it is screwed on the machine tight. I had to tighten it twice before it stopped leaking. The power cord is about the same length as my previous washer but the pressure hose seems a bit shorter. The pump end of the pressure hose appears to be a standard one so it should be possible to add an extention. There is a warning in the manual not to leave the motor running without water flow but this appears to be fixed as it also says on another page that it has a flow detector which shuts off the pump when you release the trigger and this is the way it works. The manual says the washer is warranted for 1 year (gun and hose 90 days)but does not say where to register it. I called the company and they told me they would honor the warranty as long as I had the receipt even if it wasn't registered but I could register it on their web site. I haven't used the spray wand yet but the turbo wand works great. Well worth the money!

Upon set up of the AR363, (which was straight forward) the quickee coupler and inlet valve to the pressure washer did not work. It fit improperly. I left an e-mail to Wayfair (Amazon) with a reply to look into it. No reply since. I called the manufacturer with and immiadeate response with a new quick coupler and valve. It worked, however it also leaks. I am trying to find a brass fitting instead of the plastic which came with the unit.
Good electric pressure washer with good power. Easy to use but a little awkward to pull around a long power cord cord and a long hose when you go a long distance from the hose bib.

reviews.review_header: Nice but could be more consumer friendly
reviews.review_text: Nice washer but could be more consumer friendly. The washer itself is fine, it's just too bad AR doesn't make their product to allow using quick-connect nozzles. At 1900 psi, it would be nice to be able to quickly and positively change from one cone angle to another without twisting the built-in nozzle repeatedly. Tossing a quick-connect nozzle on is much faster and more positive.

reviews.review_header: connector between hose and pressure washer has leaked notably. ...
reviews.review_text: connector between hose and pressure washer has leaked notably...have to be careful where I place the unit or else it quickly will be sitting in a puddle of water due to the leaking.

Just arrived this week and have already spent two full days using it to power wash patio, driveway and sidewalks around my corner lot house. Worked perfectly right from the start and never slowed down. Easy to get started. Had never heard of this brand, but after reading reviews and since it was a great price, I decided to go for it. So far, so good!
Liked it a lot! It fit my needs perfect for around the house! I like the built in storage! Wrap it up & you're good to go! Have only used it twice. Hope it holds up!

Only used once so far, but it worked out great. While I'm ready to purchase a brass fitting for the hose, the one included didn't leak at all. The pressure cleaned up some old stains from the concrete, cleaned up chairs for the summer season quickly and easily.

YUP! WORKS GREAT! DOES WHAT IT SAYS IT DOES AND MORE! Here is something else to think about AR Blue Clean. This pressure washer works Excellent On Cleaning Rugs and Door mats that are difficult to clean. WOW! DOES IS EVER WORK!

Very powerful in a small package. Runs very very steady. Cleaned 2 years worth of grime of my deck. if I would have gone slow it would have taken paint off. Had a window put in the basement wall and saw water left a film on the surrounding brick. This took it right off.

reviews.review_header: Mine Leaked everywhere. The Threading for screwing the hose ...
reviews.review_text: Mine Leaked everywhere. The Threading for screwing the hose onto was stripped off. Nothing but junk would not buy again. Had high hopes with all the positive reviews.
Works very well on concrete driveway and brick stairs. I had no idea my driveway was an ivory concrete. I was able to remove craft acrylic paints off the pavement. Slow process, but works well.

This pressure washer works great - it was perfect for my needs of washing the house and the car, etc. The company is excellent to work with. They were available by phone when we had a few questions, and helped us to solve any technical difficulties to make for a wonderful experience. I highly recommend this pressure washer.

It works well for cleaning my equipment on the golf course, no gas and less CO2 emissions. Too bad that it does not have a brass connector, but if you are careful moving it around there is no problem. If it breaks I will get a brass connector. It is perfect for a lot of small jobs and it works well on cleaning the concrete driveway at home.

I only got to use this for a short time before winter hit. I was able to power wash the garage and driveway after having foundation work performed on the house. It was able to get up most of the concrete and mortar left over from the easy cleanup of construction equipment. I will be testing this out on washing the cars and the siding on the house in the spring.

The spool for the hose is pretty lame, unless you want to disconnect everything each time you use it. The power is good, the multiple wands are nice. One provides a single intense spray, the other a variable fan for lower pressure, sweeping type action. I am satisfied.

reviews.review_header: Economical and fairly compact. Definitely not as powerful as ...
reviews.review_text: Economical and fairly compact. Definitely not as powerful as bigger units but seems to have enough power to get the job for our use. We're using this to clean concrete and it gets the job done about as well as bigger washers that some of our neighbors have.

reviews.review_header: I am older and this is just a nice size and power to use for small jobs around ...
reviews.review_text: Works very well for cleaning my patio and sidewalks. I am older and this is just a nice size and power to use for small jobs around the house.

expectations were not met by this product--1900 water pressure sucks. One does not need two hands to operate. My water pressure into the house is 85 to 90 lbs. IF I could send it back I would. Not worth buying--- GO bigger "2400"

I have had several electric power washers over the years. This one is the best. It will do some real deep cleaning of concrete. It also did a great job cleaning the exterior of the house. My only complaint is that one should purchase a connector to the machine that will connect to the plastic connector filter which comes with the machine. I can see that this is a potential weakness of the product after some use.

reviews.review_header: This product is really bad. The motor dont work anymore after two years ...
reviews.review_text: This product is really bad. The motor dont work anymore after two years with a low monthly use. And I dont find a replacement part in any place in the word.

Poor performance, feels cheaply made. nozzle does not adjust as well. borrowed friends power washer with 1850 psi and was much more effective with interchangeable nozzles which were easier to use and adjustable without using power. very disappointed.

this little electric power washer is a great machine for around the house. i've used it for the past 5 months, decks, concrete, m/cycles and vehicles. i've used it for hours at a time and no problem so far.

reviews.review_header: AR Blue Clean AR383 Pressure washer
reviews.review_text: The Ar Blue Clean pressure washer functions great. The hose real and caddy for the cord is poor at best. Just role the hose and hang it on the hose real handle. Coil the cord up and hang it over the washer handle. The washer handle is to short to pull the unit without bending while you are pulling it. It would be great for those under 5' tall.

This is my first pressure washer. I can't compare to any other. But I'm impressed with it's simplicity and water pressure. As most people have stated, it's mostly plastic housing and connectors. I'll see how long it will last. My first use was to clean the sides of my house and it did a great job. I'm sure a car wash will be just as good.

The quality of the unit is fine, but these guys get 5 stars for customer service. Mine came missing a piece and with an extra of another, and one two minute phone call later the right part was on the way. All they needed was my address. It was a very pleasant surprise.

I hated this thing, it leaked like crazy with its plastic fitting in the front, good luck getting the hose wound up and its directions are terrible. Also If your ultimate goal is to write your name in the accumulated mold on your drive way then the 1.5 GPM unit is for you. I just purchased a unit this Christmas with 3.0 GPM and Gas powered and it dwarfed the performance of this electric, go with gas the benefits outweigh the cons.

reviews.review_header: Just as expected from previous reviews.
reviews.review_text: After reading the reviews, I decided to purchase a pressure washer. I was thrilled with the power of this little machine. My patio concrete had developed a blackish mold and undesirable appearance. With the aid of the power washer and a special concrete cleaner the mold was blasted away. The power washer wasn't as noisy as I thought it would be and is light enough to carry or wheel around. I do wished that it had a longer hose though. I'd recommend this product and it was priced right.

reviews.review_header: This is a very good washer. I have had no problems with it
reviews.review_text: This is a very good washer. I have had no problems with it. However, it is something of a hassle to wind the cord with the soap dispenser in place. And if you wind the cord without the dispenser in place, you cannot get the dispenser into its place ! The most disturbing part of this washer is the soap dispenser itself.

This machine is sturdy and easily moves with you. It's great for patio furniture and sidewalks. I had problems with the spray cleaner bottle coming off the cleaning gun and cleaner spray didn't reach very far. I found that it is easier to just use a spray bottle to spray cleaner. Let cleaner soak in and then use pressure washer. I did not have a problem with connection leaking like some others have complained.

reviews.review_header: Not enough pressure for a real cleaning job.
reviews.review_text: This is not really a criticism of this particular product. It's more of an observation that electric pressure washers just don't have enough pressure to clean much of anything. There was pollen on my deck chairs, and this pressure washer didn't get the pollen off. What use is a pressure washer that won't even clean pollen off of deck chairs? I ended up hiring someone with a gas-powered system to clean my house.

reviews.review_header: Great deal in a small package
reviews.review_text: I was a llittle skeptical when I received the unit and unpacked it. I had just had a gas engine powerwasher go bad and this new electric one had a lot of plastic parts. But, after using the unit, it proved to be great and worked well. I was impressed by how easy it was to move around and it was so lightweight compared to my old gas unit.

Great product for the price...I had a 1900psi gas powered washer and this electric does just a good. Easy to assemble, use and store. I would buy another if needed. I have power washed a wrap around deck, large barn and house...still going strong.

First of all, my thanks to all of the prior buyers/reviewers whose comments steered me to the AR North America 1900 psi electric washer. I just "played" with it for the first time and was very impressed. Easy and fast to assemble. The "turbo nozzle" is phenomenal--breaks up and removes layers of mildew, moss and grime that had set into my patio tiles. While I've only used it for a short time so far, I'm alredy "sold" on it over the gas unit I would have otherwise rented due to its light weight, power and reasonable price. Plus I have it when I want it. Several of the prior posts reported that the supplied plastic garden hose to washer connector leaked, with the solution being to purchase a brass fitting from the hardware store. I clicked on the Amazon "linked" brass connector and thought I was being smart in buying this too. Well, I found that you are fine with what AR supplies as long as you make sure that you insert all of the washers they supply (a hose washer inside each end as well as the washer/filter on the hose side)!! It didn't leak a drop. Oh well, I'll keep that brass fitting for some emergency around the yard in the future. Not a criticism of the prior posts as without your comments I wouldn't have purchased this product! Good luck to all and happy cleaning.

reviews.review_header: For the money, this is a good product
reviews.review_text: So far, so good. Product did not leak as others have reported and it cleaned very well and with enough pressure to remove stain. Cleaned brick also. It is for smaller jobs around the house but it works. Some of the connections are plastic so consider accessories that might be more durable, such as the connections between hose and unit. I purchased a brass connector.

Within two days of purchase, the flimsy plastic garden hose adapter cracked. I'm hoping that another reviewer is correct when he mention getting a brass hose adapter. I don't want to return the entire machine because that part will break again.

reviews.review_header: The washer does a good job with low water volume so you don't need ...
reviews.review_text: Works as advertised. The built in wand holders don't hold. The washer does a good job with low water volume so you don't need as much water to do the job.

Great product! I purchased this product for my fiancé as a birthday gift. I didn't have any clue as to what kind of "power washer" to purchase, but he like working in the yard and on the house. I read some reviews of a few washers, and one said that this product was the best for home use. He seems thrilled with it. It cleaned the carpets of his boat great. The play equipment looks new again. We love this product. The cords and hoses are kind of a pain, but that can be worked with.
It wasn't hard to put together. This "pressure washer" couldn't even clean the bird poop off of my patio table. I expected more from this equipment.

This pressure washer was easy to assemble and use; just follow the instructions. We used it in combination with a deck washing solution purchased at the local home improvement store. It cleaned the wood deck surface easily. However, you need to control the working distance carefully. As mentioned in the instructions, it will tear up the wood if you get the working tip too close to the deck. I'm very pleased with this pressure washer.

This is amazingly powerful, light and easy to use. I have used it on multiple decks, concrete, and patio furniture. If you aren't careful it will splinter wood, crack concrete and sent paint chips flying. My only criticism is the hose. It is very stiff and if not kept perfectly straight, water flow will be impeded.

Once the "operator" (me) adjusted the spray as the instructions said, this worked great!! I wash my vinyl siding every year, and this is the best pressure washer that I have used, well worth the money. I hope I don't have to replace for a long time, but would definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_header: Ever go to Burning Man? This will clean EVERYTHING ...
reviews.review_text: Ever go to Burning Man? This will clean EVERYTHING you have! Cleanliness is next to Godliness!
Very quality washer lightweight for the Mrs so I can watch the game----ladies love this because it's powerful and doesn't say wait til tomorrow

reviews.review_header: good price for a nice unit..............
reviews.review_text: originally received open box but Amazon took back and sent new one. Amazpn always great to deal with, excellent customer service. Unit work well but some problems with water leaking from connector, have not contacts AR yet but plan to..............

reviews.review_header: I've cleaned the back deck and the drive way and its been really easy to use
reviews.review_text: I got this specifically so that I would be able to use myself to do jobs around the house and not have wait for my husband or someone else to help me. I've cleaned the back deck and the drive way and its been really easy to use.

We've been using this washer (heavily) for about a week now. It does a great job for its price. We've gotten dirt that's been on paving stones for almost a year off in moments. Again, can't say enough about how impressed my family is with this unit.

reviews.review_header: It's very nice, works well" but unrapping the cord you have ...
reviews.review_text: It's very nice, works well" but unrapping the cord you have to take all atachments off . All in all very nice light weight.
Works well. Used it about 4 times so far. No problem. Great for stripping old paint, cleaning dirty cement patio, walkways...

This AR Blue Clean AF383 is very powerful yet very compact. I used it to power wash a 15 year old fence to prepare for painting. It did a great job of removing dirt as well as old paint chips. I then used it to clean the driveway and sidewalks. It was strong enough to get rid of old stains. This machine is easy to use. Recommend it very highly.

reviews.review_header: I love that little blue electric washer
reviews.review_text: I have three high pressure washers. From a large 4000 pound PSI heavy duty washer.... The little blue electric washer is my far the lightest and simplest you carry and set up for anybody on my staff.... I keep it hooked up 24 seven and ready to do any job at my office parking lot.... My employees drive up and touch up their car routinely

I used this product to clean my wood deck and concrete around my house. It was better than expected. It has plenty of power for household chores . Since it was very reasonably priced, I was worried that it might not work well. I was pleasantly surprised. I am so glad I did not spend more money for a more powerful model.

Love love love this thing my buddy had one and we use them for cleaning sides of house cleaning concrete fourwheelers trucks. Everything and these things are awesome exceed my expectations I will never use a gas washer again. Electric is the way to go.

reviews.review_header: Excellent unit. Does the job on our deck
reviews.review_text: Excellent unit. Does the job on our deck, walkways, stone work, siding, van, car, power equipment, etc. My only complaint is that it's a little hard to stow the hose and cord. It otherwise works so well, I feel bad even mentioning that!
Worked well when working. Used twice since purchased last year, no longer works. Don't do it to yourselves.
did not work when arrived. the system to reel in the cable was not set up right so the hose would not reel in properly.

reviews.review_header: It's a nice little pressure washer
reviews.review_text: It's a nice little pressure washer. The turbo nozzel is good for removing dirt from ATV's. The other nozzel is easily adjusted and great for washing down the garage. The hose could be a little longer and the real doesn't seem worth messing with. It's light and easy to move around and has a nice long cord.
As expected for the price. Works great for easy jobs. Soap dispenser is almost worthless though.

reviews.review_header: If you want a broken washer, this one is for you!
reviews.review_text: Showed up broken. The inlet for the hose was stripped. Was going to wash patio before a large party and was so disappointed that this did not work.

reviews.review_header: Light weight and easy to move with one hand when needed to get ...
reviews.review_text: I use this primarily to wash our cars, clean out garage and other areas such as back patio. For these purposes this washer has plenty of power. Length of power cord and washer hose is sufficient. Light weight and easy to move with one hand when needed to get around to other side of vehicles.

reviews.review_header: Almost two years and still running strong!
reviews.review_text: Almost two years and still running strong with my weekly car washes, (4 cars total). The washer that connects the high pressure hose to the gun is wearing off so it leaks, but it is an easy fix. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_header: Great buy, bargain of the day
reviews.review_text: Great buy, bargain of the day. prefect for us women that like cleaning with power machines; light in weight. Power washed our roof & backyard very nice machine.
The Pressure washer worked well until the motor blew. I think that this is a know problem with this model and should be addressed by AR under warranty.

reviews.review_header: This one does a much better job and the old pressure washer's accessories work with ...
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a Gold Box special. My old pressure washer is a smaller AR Blue and it doesn't have enough pressure to get all the mold stains off of my vinyl siding. This one does a much better job and the old pressure washer's accessories work with it.

The pressure washer does an excellent job of cleaning. It has good pressure. It was easy to put together out of the box. The hose lengths are more than adequate for my needs. I would have preferred that brass fittings had been used instead of plastic for more durability, however, for the money this is a very good pressure washer.

reviews.review_header: Probably Shouldn't be the #1 Best Seller...
reviews.review_text: It's lightweight but clumsy. When I was shopping for it on Amazon, I thought it was going to be better designed than it is. The hose spooling system is not nearly as convenient as I thought it would be. It has been working fine for light house use but I wouldn't want to use this for a heavy duty application.

reviews.review_header: This thing is great. I wasnt expecting much from an electric powerwasher
reviews.review_text: This thing is great. I wasnt expecting much from an electric powerwasher, but it really does the job. From siding to concrete to wood, it will suffice for all your home powerwashing needs!

reviews.review_header: it has good power, glad I saw this request for a ...
reviews.review_text: It leaks, and leaks, and leaks. For the price, it has good power, glad I saw this request for a review, I am considering returning and upgrading to something that isn't so leaky. I wouldn't depend on it, lots of plastic and cheap wiring.

reviews.review_header: Works great, very happy with the product
reviews.review_text: Works great, very happy with the product. Only negative is the roller for the pressure hose is pretty week, however, I can live without it. B

This power washer works good. It is small, light weight weight and stores away in a compact form. I also bought the brass hose connecter because of reported failures with the one that comes with it. The one that came with my washer it has a small fine water filter screen in it and works fine.

So dont make the mistake and put on the hose connector backwards like it did. I thought it was broken and bought a whole new connector just to find out later I put it on backwards (you will know it is on backwards when it leaks alot). It cleans pretty good. Overall: Im satisfied with my purchase and the item.

I use it for porches (floor and railing), sidewalks, and the driveway. It is easy to use. It is lightweight and handling is not difficult for this senior citizen. It is easy to transport to children's homes for them to use. I have not had it long enough to judge durability, but it has plenty of pressure for my needs.

reviews.review_header: looks great! Last unit I had ran constantly
reviews.review_text: Works well for a non-commercial/home unit. Many parts are plastic but will hold up if treated well. Did the front patio and driveway, looks great! Last unit I had ran constantly, like that this one cuts the motor when not spraying.

I seldom take time to write a review but this product deserves it. It came with a quick start guide making it easy to get started and an 800 number if you need anything. What made me write this review is the quality of the product and the unexpected performance. I am glad I did not buy a gas power cleaner when this one is all I need. It IS the one to buy!!!!!!!!!!!!
Not nearly as good as the pressure washer I bought before this one. To clean tough stains like concrete sidewalks and patios, I have to place the nozzle about two inches from the surface.
I've been using this occasionally for 2 years now, and it still works great. The reel is useless, but other that that, it's a good design. 10/10 would buy again.

reviews.review_header: The plastic hose connector threads do not fit a standard ...
reviews.review_text: The plastic hose connector threads do not fit a standard hose female connection . Very lightweight connector .
Easy to assemble and is a powerful machine and lightweight at that. Cleans concrete, engine bays, outdoor furniture, etc.

Just got delivery. Assembled easily except for hose reel. Could not figure how to connect the hose to the reel. In any case, I fired it up to clean my moldy pool deck. It worked great without any chemicals. It paid for itself in the first use.I also used it to clean the rails on my hurricane shutters. A real winner. Thanks Amazon for the good price.

reviews.review_header: Good machine - glad we bought it
reviews.review_text: This machine was a little tricky to figure out the first time we used it, but it does a good job. Avoid using it on a very very hot day because it does take some effort to control the water the way you want to use it. I was successful in removing 30 years of embedded grit from our patio and also had the fun of writing my name in water on the filth before washing it all down!

reviews.review_header: Was a little nervous about it being electric, but ...
reviews.review_text: Was a little nervous about it being electric, but after reading reviews thought I would give it a try. Meet my needs very well, cleaning wooden deck and siding. Only downfall I found was the built in reel. pain in the butt. I opt not to use it.

reviews.review_header: I've rented pressure washers many times. I'm used to ...
reviews.review_text: I've rented pressure washers many times. I'm used to them actually getting my decks and concrete clean. This does not. Not nearly enough pressure

reviews.review_header: We have not used it for the cars but worked great on cleaning the garage floor
reviews.review_text: We bought this to remove the old paint off the old deck. It did n OK job. We have not used it for the cars but worked great on cleaning the garage floor.

reviews.review_header: It takes a while but leaves me with a nice looking deck for the year
reviews.review_text: This is my second one. I busted the first. It doesn't have a whole lot of power but that's probably an advantage for a casual user. I clean my deck at the beginning of each spring season. It takes a while but leaves me with a nice looking deck for the year.

reviews.review_header: Wife likes it better than me
reviews.review_text: Small, lightweight and quiet. Wife likes it better than me. For the price it does what it is supposed to. Great for car washes, etc...but I purchased mainly to wash vinyl siding. It will not remove dirt without washing first. I washed the siding with bleach and water and then sprayed and it worked fine.

reviews.review_header: The hose connection is not plastic anymore
reviews.review_text: No need to write another review. There are so many. But i just wanted to mention that AR must have read the complaints about the plastic connection. It's no longer plastic. It's not brass, but it's some sort of metal. Feels like a pretty solid, quality machine, much better than the Pulsar pressure washer i purchased.
Very quiet and powerful... a great value for the price! Lightweight and good length on the the power cord and high pressure hose. I'd highly recommend this product... very happy with it.
Good solid product. Bit unwieldy - but I am not sure you can have a power washer that isn't - nature of the beast. Held up well though and does a good job.
Product was exactly as described. It was powerful enough to pressure wash my drive-way made of paver stones. Relatively easy to use. The attachment holder is okay.

The only reason i didnt give it a 5 is the hose reel. It is a pain to use. The hose is to stiff to rap around that small of diameter of reel.If its cold you might as well forget it. Im afraid hose will kink so i took it off and just rap around handle. The hose and power cord are a great length and everything else works good.
