Packaging was fine and the instruction were clear - although the brochure used the smallest type known to man! I got it all hooked up to power and water supply and it worked as advertised. 1900 PSI isn't going to blow the stucco off your house but it's good for cleaning walkways, etc. I found the soap dispenser to be useless but otherwise the rest of the attachments were fine. Unlike other reviewers I have had no leaks.

reviews.review_header: Higher pressure than most electric washers, does an adequate job
reviews.review_text: The hose reel is kind of unusable, makes the thing top heavy. The pump is powerful enough for most jobs and the turbo tip really adds to the cleaning power. Not as good as a gas powered washer, and the hoses and cords make it a bit cumbersome, but all in all, a good do-it-yourselfer tool. I would recommend this for homeowners who like to clean patios and sidewalks, but would recommend the purchase of the disc washer as well.

reviews.review_header: So far so good, wife used it to clean the sidewalk and ...
reviews.review_text: So far so good, wife used it to clean the sidewalk and worked almost as well as our 3500psi gas powerwasher. The only complaint is the hose reel and power cord keeper are too small and don't work well at all. The unit itself is good, decent power and great for small - medium jobs you do frequently.

It's a little more fragile than I expected (lots of plastic) and the onboard component storage is a bit awkward, but it is light and easy to maneuver (because of the plastic) and cleans very well. Lots of pressure, and I prefer the adjustable wand to having to switch heads. Assuming good reliability (yet to be proven) I think it offers excellent value for the price.

I like the ease of use, compact size, and the pressure is good. Good for washing the cars and for small jobs around the house. Didn't give it 5 stars because the nozzle is plastic. I feel like I have to be careful, and it leaks a little bit. But overall, I am pleased with the pressure washer and the price.

The pressure does not come out as strong that I would had liked it to not sure if it was from the adapters it had come with but it did not do a good job as my hose did. It had taken a long and many strokes to just get a little clean. This product would be great for washing a vehicle or any other delicate item.

reviews.review_header: Works like a champ but why the heck would they make ...
reviews.review_text: Works like a champ but why the heck would they make the water hose connection not fit to the U.S. Standards? Even with plumbers tape I still have water leaking out of the darn machine! 😁

reviews.review_header: The person I ordered it for said it works great and he wished he would have order it two ...
reviews.review_text: I ordered this machine as a gift. The person I ordered it for said it works great and he wished he would have order it two years ago. It has saved him so much time for what he uses it for. He has been using it all summer and has had no problems at all. He would recommend this machine to anybody.
Works really well for the home owner. Very pleased with this unit, easy to use and ready whenever I am.
Broke after a couple uses. I should have just purchased a Honda model in the first place.
lighter than my previous one and better made.

reviews.review_header: Awesome product for the money to use around the house.
reviews.review_text: I was looking for an affordable yet capable power washer. The AR Blue Clean fits the bill. It's great for cleaning the sidewalk and driveway, the barbecue grill, the mower, and more. There were some for less money and many for more money. This one had better reviews than any other in the price range. So it's got a little leak at one of the connectors. That's not big deal.

I used this around the house, cleans vinyl siding really well. Cleans concrete walkways and car rims. The only problem with this washer is as described by all the previous reviews -- it leaks (even with the new and improved adapter). However, since it's an outdoor tool I didn't let it bother me too much, the cleaning capability makes up for the leaking, streaming water.

reviews.review_header: For smaller jobs it may be fine but we had to find another means to clean ...
reviews.review_text: Not enough power to do what we needed. For smaller jobs it may be fine but we had to find another means to clean our cement patio. Disappointed.

reviews.review_header: Brought it in July for clean up after Sandy. Died the second time using it.
reviews.review_text: Brought it in July 2013 with the intention for clean up after storm Sandy. Finally had a chance to use it in October. Worked great the first time. The second time, flipped the switch and the unit is dead as a door knob. Tried everything. Will see if I can get a replacement unit.

reviews.review_header: Pretty good pressure for such a compact unit
reviews.review_text: Pretty good pressure for such a compact unit. Cleaned my disgusting mold and mildew covered awnings without breaking a sweat. Everything feels a bit fragile ( nothing broken yet mind you), from the plastic hose connector to the plastic wand tips. But, for the money it's tough to complain.

reviews.review_header: Best electric power washer on the market
reviews.review_text: Best value electric power washer out there. Tried a few other brands with similar specs and ended up returning both. This thing is a beast. Quick connector does leak a little but not enough to affect pressure. Just used it for an hour continuously and no issues. Turned my neighbor's old cedar fence into like-new.

reviews.review_header: My first came in and a weather messed up within ...
reviews.review_text: My first came in and a weather messed up within a week. My second one has been a lot more durable.

reviews.review_header: As other people mentioned the attached valve for the water ...
reviews.review_text: As other people mentioned the attached valve for the water supply hose is a complete flop and needs to be replaced.

Unit is compact enough and the instructions easy enough to understand. but make sure the "Inlet" water Quick connect is firmly on before switching on the unit or the pressure motor will be damaged if run dry. Pros:- Easy to operate, good pressure and a nice touch is the unit switches off when you let go of the trigger. Cons:- Not easy to roll the High pressure hose around the drum provided on the unit.

this is not a very powerful washer but it does a nice job if you have the time to just work with it. the sidewalk and driveway look great afterward but it still has some trouble with the tougher stains from our damp Oregon winters, especially the black mold. it dispatches with moss with no problem and leaves the concrete lookin pretty good

reviews.review_header: AR Blue working good so far
reviews.review_text: I have used it 4 times so far and all is good. the wands could have a little bit different holding design on the back of the unit but it does not affect the function of the unit. I also wish it had a retractable cord instead of having to wind it up on the back all the time but once again does not affect how it works in anyway. Good pressure and what I expected when ordered!

reviews.review_header: Not nearly as much power as expected. Doesn't clean ...
reviews.review_text: Not nearly as much power as expected. Doesn't clean off all the dirt on my cAr and then I have to rub the dirt off with a rag and soap. Hose real is a real hassle.

reviews.review_header: Worked for approximately 2 years and died. The fittings ...
reviews.review_text: Worked for approximately 2 years and died. The fittings are cheap. While it was working it did a decent job given the low psi.

I like using this power washer, I've used it on smooth concrete, exposed aggregate pavement, outdoor canopy, exterior of a camper, and getting mud off cars. Note: I wouldn't use it near seals of windows and doors. I bought the Male to Male fitting from Nelson, works great and NO LEAKS!

I purchased this washer to replace a Karcher, which I thought died well before it's time. I am quite satisfied with almost every aspect of the AR. All of the fittings and attachments have the feel of a commercial grade piece of equpment, unlike my Karcher. I should mention that the maximum output pressure of the turbo nozzle seems lower than that of the Karcher's. Not a deal killer, but worth mentioning.

The unit works as promised. That is not the problem. The problem is this...why would a manufacturer produce a unit with a male hose connection? This requires the use of a female to female hose coupler which is difficult to find and, if you read the reviews of others who have tried various couplers, these things range from junk to leaky at best. How about it AR?...make a unit with a female connector. Life will be easier and your sales will rise.

reviews.review_header: I expected better cleaning power with pressure washer
reviews.review_text: I expected better cleaning power with pressure washer, but it only saves water. I bought it for washing siding of my house. I could not get normal results without scraping,

reviews.review_header: This is the best! I cleaned the windows
reviews.review_text: This is the best! I cleaned the windows, the sliders, the house, the concrete pads, the wheels on my Mercedes. Why didn't I have one of these a long time ago? All the cords and hoses are a tangled nightmare, but all things considered, this is the bee's knees.

reviews.review_header: Light Weight but powerful enough to do most jobs
reviews.review_text: I have only used this unit once and it worked well. It is convenient to use and so far I am pleased with the units performance. The only "weak link" in the system is the clear plastic hose attachment. Do yourself a favor and replace it with a brass fitting. My plastic connector cracked and started leaking. This is the only reason I gave the unit a 4/5.

reviews.review_header: Great product. I am looking for more things to ...
reviews.review_text: Great product. I am looking for more things to power wash around the house. One negative - the grips to hold the attachments are not great: too close together. Suggestions by other posters worked for me.

reviews.review_header: It has good pressure with an adjustable spray pattern
reviews.review_text: This pressure washer met all of my needs. I use it on my patio and sidewalks. It has good pressure with an adjustable spray pattern. Make sure you purchase some "pump saver" product for storage. I would highly recommend this product based on price and quality.
Very powerful washer, works great on cleaning our siding, deck, chairs and patio. Def would buy this again. Got on sale for a cant beat price.

reviews.review_header: Really not better than a powerful hose nozzle
reviews.review_text: Not powerful enough and unable to wind up the nose for storage. Wheel just doesn't work well. Really not better than a powerful hose nozzle.

reviews.review_header: The reviews I read before purchasing it contain some useful tips on its strengths and weaknesses
reviews.review_text: I have had this unit now for a short time, and so far it has lived up to my expectations. It is my first pressure washer, and I had some learning to do to use it effectively. The reviews I read before purchasing it contain some useful tips on its strengths and weaknesses.

reviews.review_header: swing and a miss, everything I wanted jusy didn't deliver
reviews.review_text: Not sure how they came up with 1900 psi, but the stream of water I got was not enough to do anything other than rinse the driveway. Really wanted something easy to use. Well designed and easy to get started, just not what I expected.

I have two dogs and sometimes they do their business on the concrete in the back yard. This pressure washer is a god sent. It does a fantastic job of cleaning the dog stains. It also did a great job of removing paint that had spilled in my driveway. It's a great product and I highly recommend it.

This is my first review on Amazon. I am so pleased with this pressure washer, I had to give it a 5 star rating. If you need a pressure washer for chores around the house and washing your vehicles (for me, this includes a compact tractor), this is the one to buy...especially if you have a well (the low (1.5 GPM) water requirement ensures you won't draw down your well).

reviews.review_header: Excellent product with plenty of power!
reviews.review_text: I had been wanting to clean all my concrete walkways and driveway. After looking for quite a while the reviews of this pressure washer made me take a chance on this product. Didn't want to deal with gas and oil so electric was the way to go for me. My driveway took about 3 hours but came out beautiful in the end. The washer had plenty of power to handle the job. Time will tell as to how long it will last.

front and back porch - clean. Adirondaks - clean. doormats - clean. Could go taugher on concrete and brick getting rid of algae, but still great improvement. I do believe though, the attachments are some 10 inches too short, unless the target market is 4'5-5'4 tall.. This weekend will try to deal with wooden fence... Any suggestions?
It did the job of washing my house prior to painting without issue

reviews.review_header: ... but the sprayer needs to be clamped a lot better because it will fall off
reviews.review_text: Once you figure out how to use it it does okay but the sprayer needs to be clamped a lot better because it will fall off. Other reviewers have experienced the same problem. I jury rigged a clamp to keep it tight and intact and it seems to work fine.

I have used this to spray the brick in front of my house, the sidewalks, concrete stairs, siding, and most importantly washing my car and you cant beat it for the price. pressure cuts out often at times, but Im sure that has something to do with me doing something wrong. just obnoxious at times but comes right back. Overall im happy. no leaks as of yet like some other reviewers
A crackerjack machine that did what I wanted. It's light, but powerful enough to clean. Easy to use.

reviews.review_header: it will be fine. If you do much work with this unit
reviews.review_text: Works well. I worry about the plastic water quick connect breaking on me but if I'm careful and do not stress it, it will be fine. If you do much work with this unit, you're going want to get the 25 foot HP hose extension.

reviews.review_header: I WANTED TO LIKE THIS, BUT...
reviews.review_text: The most useless plastic fittings I've come across anywhere. Leakage was so severe that to stand anywhere near the unit while using caused my clothes to become soaking wet. Some internal leakage but I didn't realize that for a while because of the external leaks. I couldn't figure out why it wasn't working properly at first then I realized the internal workings were leaking pressure somewhere inside the plastic cabinet, thus causing lack of pressure at the nozzle. I figure this must have been shipped with some water present from testing and then was stored in a location where it froze and split open inside. I doubt if this type leakage would not be noticed while being made. I would have ordered a replacement but after reading other reviews I realized there seems to be a high rate of failures on other units and most right out of the box. I therefore requested a return for refund. I will look locally tomorrow for a replacement. Thanks to Amazon's no hassle return policy I am at least able to for-go any out of pocket expense. If you are thinking of buying this product make sure you save the receipt. Just a word to the wise.

reviews.review_header: AR BLUE CLEAN 1900PSI A QUALITY UNIT
reviews.review_text: Great machine. Plenty of power, easy to assemble, and a real workhorse. I have used my machine five times in the last three weeks and it performs well every time. I would highly recommend this unit to anyone for big or small jobs.

Our water supply is from a well with low pressure. This power washer has been great to wash all those things we could never get enough pressure to really clean. Easy to use, great that all the attachments fit right on the unit

reviews.review_header: Great for maintenance around the house
reviews.review_text: My family and I are getting ready to put our house up for sale and I wanted to pressure wash the driveway and siding of my house. Wow what a difference. I wish I would have taken some before and after photos to show but trust me the difference is incredible. It takes quite a while to accomplish but it is well worth the wait.

Wish that it had a power spray incorporating a container for a siding/aluminum cleaner. A simple dial on a container metering the proper ratio, water/cleaner, together with a power spray with enough pressure to reach 20' would be great. Other than that it does a good job for a homeowner. I hope it is reliable as previous models had a very short life.

reviews.review_header: I really liked it at first and afterwards was very dissappointed
reviews.review_text: The units pressure setting stopped working after one season and the hose became kinked and broken so I had to trash it and buy something else at a local store.I really liked it at first and afterwards was very dissappointed.

reviews.review_header: By far the best pressure washer I have ever had!
reviews.review_text: Received it today and my 16 year old just used it to do my entire deck. Its an awesome machine, well worth the money. LOVE IT and I don't like anything. Its the third pressure washer I have owned, you would never know its not a gasoline engine putting out the water. Its like a fire hose, it will wear you out after an hour or so, holding it. I will buy it again for sure.

reviews.review_header: WEEK ENDER IS BETTER THIS ONE IS TO HARD TO SET-UP AND SPRAY ...
reviews.review_text: WEEK ENDER IS BETTER THIS ONE IS TO HARD TO SET-UP AND SPRAY HEAD NOT GOOD, BUT IT DOSE WORK
the thing is okay, but after a few uses, the front nozzle attachement starts to leak. It will still work, but leaves a big ass mess...Good for the money though. Try buy it and see for yourself.

reviews.review_header: The first time I used it the motor blew out ...
reviews.review_text: The first time I used it the motor blew out. Unfortunately I had it for more than 1 year before I used it.

reviews.review_header: Great product! Does the job and is very strong
reviews.review_text: Great product! Does the job and is very strong! Durable and reliable. Don't forget to buy the winterization liquid to keep this valuable product safe during the freezing winters.
Hose attachment broke on first use. Unit completely stopped working after two light uses. Junk, I obviously would not recommend.

reviews.review_header: Gift for husband. He loves it. Still working ...
reviews.review_text: Gift for husband. He loves it. Still working a year later and has cleaned almost everything outside at our house. Small and portable too.
My deck was black from 30 years of neglect. With this machine it looks brand new & didn't harm the wood! So pleased with this purchase!
product detail says MADE IN USA this is why I bought it. when I got the item I found it's MADE IN CHINA. I contacted AMAZON 2 times by email NO RESPONE. I am not happy with CHINA JUNKS.
Only worked for 30 minutes. Junk.

reviews.review_header: Save yourself hassle in life and get a pro electric model or gas powered pressure washer!
reviews.review_text: This is a very, very basic unit and underpowered. Waste of my money. I didn't want to deal with a gas unit, but my bad experience with this product made me take a leap, and I'm sorry I wasted my money on this. Pros: ++ None, really. Compact, maybe? E.g. it fits in your trash can really well!! Cons: -- Not powerful enough for me to perform basic tasks such as cleaning siding or concrete. It's only good for light duty cleanup such as dirt removal from a patio, patio furniture, or a car. -- You need to really focus on a small spot to get any type of deep cleaning accomplished and at that rate it takes forever to accomplish anything. Not worth your time or your money! -- I'm also disappointed in how long it takes to set the unit up and break it down. Several minutes of screwing around with the clunky contraption. -- The hose reel is a pain in the neck to operate and my hose has sharp bends in it from trying to use the hose reel. -- The power cord storage grooves barely fit the power cord, then you're left with no where to put the "wall wart" on the end of the cord. -- Make sure you put the pieces away in a specific order, otherwise you need to unravel everything to fit the pieces in the unit: 1) pressure hose, 2) chemical container (this secures the end of the pressure hose), 3) power cord, 4) accessories. -- The wall wart keeps you from plugging this into typical outdoor receptacle protectors. You need a power cord pigtail to plug it in. I used this product: 1-foot extension cord -- The unit frequently gets overheated or something, which requires me to fully shut down the unit and restart. I also need to keep releasing the front garden hose connector to break a seal or something. It's all under pressure and a pain to adjust constantly. -- You need to wait a few seconds in between releasing the trigger and pressing again. It's an odd timing you need to adhere to in order to effectively use the unit. -- The cleaning inductor never worked well for me and it's extremely messy. Poor design.

reviews.review_header: Works great as a small pressure washer
reviews.review_text: Works great as a small pressure washer, used it to power wash the backyard fence before restaining it, made the wood look almost new, got all the grim and dirt off. Great for washing the concrete patio.

Works like a champ. Have used it to change my house siding from lite green to white again. Takes the black gunk off of the driveway very well also. Have been using it hard for 2 weeks. Will update on durability later.

reviews.review_header: 4 years later the unit is still in service, replaced a pressure switch which was less than 20 dollars.
reviews.review_text: This unit works well and has plenty of power for an electric....The hookup for the inlet hose was difficult to tighten, I sure wish it was made of brass instead of plastic....I've had 3 karchers now and they all started leaking badly after a season or so...I decided to change brands, I hope this one lasts longer.

reviews.review_header: This cleaner has worked great. I used it mostly for cleaning moss off ...
reviews.review_text: This cleaner has worked great. I used it mostly for cleaning moss off my patio bricks and it has enough power for the job. Putting all the hoses and cords away is a pain ( I store them in the box it came in). If you have a lot of room it would't be an issue.

Great for cleaning moldy, stained concrete patio. Also for car washing and all od the other projests that I have attempted.No it is not as fast or powerful as a big gas powered uni6. But i can start this one and move it all around the yard by myself. I have been pleasently surprised at how powerful it is for an electric unit.

I bought the washer to clean my pontoon boat. The pressure itself is very nice and was able to clean some stubborn mildew off the deck carpeting. HOWEVER, the gaskets and connections leak like a sieve! I had to return it for a refund.

I bought this machine because of the good reviews. There were several comments on the hose adapter leaking. This happened with me also. I went out and bought a new adapter at a hardware store and the leak went away. AR should use a better adapter. The machine is solid and works great.

reviews.review_header: it has great power for a homeowner
reviews.review_text: This product worked very well for me; it has great power for a homeowner. Yes, there are many plastic parts but at this price it is very functional. These electric models are much better than gas for ease of use; I've had both kinds and electric wins!
Similar to other bad reviews, I used mine once in April 2014 and it did a nice job on my siding. Turned it on in May 2015 and it started smoking and motor blew. So much for the 1-year warranty.
Good power, cleaned our walkway, car and sidings. Works like a charm. Would highly recommend.
Exceeded my expectations. It did a great job on my huge multi level wood deck that hadn't been done in several years. My 26 year old deck looks practically new. I would recommend this product.

Bought this for my father and he loves it. Pretty light, not many buttons, and simple to use. I would recommend, as others have, to buy a brass coupler for the hose input. The plastic one leaked, but didn't upset me at all.

AR blue did not meet my expectations. Attachments are hard to change. The nozzles do not deliver the power expected of them to do a good job a cleaning sidings or driveways, they must be held close to the surface in order to get some cleaning. I recommend checking other brands, before buying AR383 - maybe there is one of equal performance for a better price.

reviews.review_header: Good unit works great. Washed the front concete stoop
reviews.review_text: Works easy to use like the pump going off when not in use. Take care at hose input point .

reviews.review_header: Works great but cheap hose fitting.
reviews.review_text: Haven't had a problem with this pressure washer! works great. Now , the reason I gave 3 stars is for the cheap hose adaptor that was blocking the water flow and almost broke the pressure washer. If anyone buy this pressure washer, make sure you get a better hose fitting.

reviews.review_header: No Pressure to buy this one!
reviews.review_text: Not much pressure. More like a high pressure water hose. The hose adapter (to which you attach the water intake) is manufactured improperly. Impossible to get a snug fit and thus a lot of water leakage.

reviews.review_header: and once you get it all set up it's easy to use
reviews.review_text: It's very powerful, and once you get it all set up it's easy to use. However, if you haven't used it in a while, you may need to refer to the manual to see exactly how to connect everything up properly, since some of the connectors are a little ambiguous.
I used this twice and on the second time a spark was noted in the wand the machine stopped and will not run.

reviews.review_header: Works great from power washing the deck to washing the car
reviews.review_text: Works great from power washing the deck to washing the car. Great pressure. Price was great and shipping was fast

Disregard the naysayers. It works and it keeps working. Oh and did I say it doesn't leak and the water connection didn't immediately break off. It's a nice little electric power washer and seems to do as advertised. If you need to wash a house rent a big unit. But for small jobs around the house and yard it seems to be the right tool for the right price.

Easy to put together, started with my concrete driveway front porch that had mold and cleaned the shed with mold on it. Then on to the house windows and the car with the soap attachment all worked great I purchased the AR Blue 10" Deck, Patio & Flat Surface Cleaner is a big time saver and all well worth the price

Just bought this and took it out for a try on my driveway. Worked perfect, no leaks. I used teflon tape on the threads of the connections, but there was absolutely no leaks of any kind. I am very impressed so far.
Didn't work for me. I have rented power cleaners and they worked fine. This one was not able to function with the existing water pressure in my house. Had to return it.

reviews.review_header: Works well and is very quiet compared to my old one.
reviews.review_text: I used it to pressure wash both my decks, two long sidewalks and a long driveway plus two vehicles. It works well and is sooo quiet compared to the Husky I have had since 2007. There were no leaks in the hose or at the couplings. It also weighs less and is easy to adjust. It never cut off due to overheating. I am very pleased and so is my husband!

Couldn't be happier with this purchase . Arrived in four days. Minimal assembly. Lightweight, great pressure. The leaking issue I read about in other reviews hasn't happened. Saved fifty dollars over the Lowes price and it was delivered to my door.

I read all the reviews before I bought this product. A few reviews stated they had problems with the quick disconnect with leakage. I didn't have that problem at all. This machine works better than the gas powered one we own which is difficult to use without help. This washer can be used by a single person and I was really impressed. I can't wait to finish pressure washing my deck. It has exceeded all my expectations.
Works great. Good pressure for an electric model. Hose connector is plastic and would be better if it was brass.

reviews.review_header: The connections and controls are very inconvenient to use. ...
reviews.review_text: The connections and controls are very inconvenient to use. The hose reel and hangers for electric cable are very cheaply made and inconvenient to use. Every thing seems to be in the wrong place for ease of operation. I definitely would not purchase this item again.

Works like a charm. I did bend the hose when setting it up...but that was "operator error"...so I can't really ding AR Blue Clean. As crazy as it sounds...I'm having fun cleaning everything around my house.
This product is poorly engineered and the inlet broke with metric threads broke within a few days. I thru this in the garbage.

I am really enjoying this product. Cleans driveway great and it was dirty. Wish it had chemicals that you could put in in a bigger container is my only reason for not giving it a five stars. Love that it is electric!

Compared to my previous pressure washer this unit is lighter and easier to use with less noise and practically no vibration.. The pressure rating of 1900 psi in this unit is 100 psi higher than my old unit but, the cleaning power seems about the same. The hose and power cord storage is convenient but, could be better designed.

Works fine. I was a little worried after reading some of the reviews. I had none of the problems others have described. I did not have to buy anything extra. Absolutely no leaks; I have the feeling some users were unfamiliar with the type of couplings used. I've only used it once--I hope it continues to work well.....
Fast shipping-just as described-Works great-Honest seller-Would buy again

reviews.review_header: it works great for small jobs around the house but I can ...
reviews.review_text: i bought this for my husband as a gift. I guess, electric is not a guy thing. it works great for small jobs around the house but I can see why gas is more preferred.

The cord reel is worthless and the unit will tip over if you're not careful, but other than that it is exactly what I need to spray off patio furniture and patio deck etc. I'm looking for a sturdy crate or box to keep it from tipping. Haven't tried it on vehicles yet, but see no reason why it will not be a handy tool to have.

reviews.review_header: The power washer was stronger than I expected and did a great job. It was easy to put together as ...
reviews.review_text: After reading reviews I saw many with issues with the hose connector leaking. I didn't have that issue at all. The power washer was stronger than I expected and did a great job. It was easy to put together as well.

reviews.review_header: This product was nice to have around but it leaked a lot
reviews.review_text: This product was nice to have around but it leaked a lot. I think the leak could have been fixed with a proper plumbing fitting

The washer is very easy to use, works well as far as doing the job it was designed for. I cleaned my walk and drive way without any problems, The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that the water hose connection is difficult to connect and it leaks and is hard to disconnect. For the money, it is very nice.

Extremely powerful! It took me a bit to figure out how to set it to full power-a button on the cord. I use it on my old brick patio and my concrete-works REALLY well! I think it was a super, great buy for the money I spent. It is light weight and very powerful. Enough power for a typical homeowner.
Light weight and easy to use and surprisingly powerful enough for my needs around the house!
I received it and the setup was easy. Worked like a charm no problems. Pretty strong for an electric power washer. 4 hours of us and no failure.

Good pressure washer for the money. Lots of pressure, adjustable nozzle, and lightweight enough to move around easily. Haven't had any leaks yet, but I am being careful to not pull it about by the hoses. Definitely meets my expectations.

I love this little cleaner for doing all types of jobs. I used it to clean the back porch. It works perfect and is not loud like my husband's gas powered pressure washer. Still learning how to use the gadgets.
Great buy for the cost. It isn't strong enough to strip a deck but meets my needs to wash the house and cars.

Work very well, strong, enough pressure for most home requirements. Use it to clean my boat and car. Cleans pool deck and other concrete surfaces.. Only negatives are hose reel -- useless. Also would like handle to be higher so I don't have to bend over when wheeling around.

reviews.review_header: WORKS GOOD...............BUT NOT RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX
reviews.review_text: FOLLOWED ALL INSTRUCTIONS, BUT DID NOT WORK, AFTER MUCH HEAD SCRATCHING IT TURNED OUT THE BRAND NEW OUT OF THE BOX NOZZLE WAS CLOGGED (HENCE THE 1 STAR DEDUCTION) WORKED GOOD AFTER THAT, NOT AS POWERFUL AS GAS POWERED BUT STILL DID A DECENT JOB ALL WITHOUT THE SMALL GAS ENGINE HEADACHE. IT'S A KEEPER. VERY EASE TO USE. I WOULD RECOMMEND.

reviews.review_header: Just what I was looking for
reviews.review_text: Yes, replace the water intake with m/m hose adapters, then get to work. Has plenty of power and even scuffed some older boards. It's great not to have to buy gas or mess with any engine. I do wish the effective spray area were larger for concrete cleaning. All in all I recommend highly.

This is a great product. My husband told me I was wasting my time ordering this. He loves it! He uses it to clean the driveway, his 4 wheeler, his motorcycle. I use it to clean grout. I researched several pressure washers before ordering this one. Glad I did. Exactly what I wanted.
We found that this pressure washer was much easier to use than we expected. It does a great job of cleaning our courtyard and uses such a small amount of water compared to using just a water hose.

reviews.review_header: Great tool at a great price
reviews.review_text: Great tool - have already cleaned the outside of the house and have stripped paint off of a door. Multiple attachments work great. Storage on the back of the unit is a plus. Recommended.

reviews.review_header: Love this things.. quiet, does the job
reviews.review_text: I love this thing, it is quiet, easy setup and cleanup. No gas. Small footprint for storage. I've cleaned my cars, driveway, deck, stripped paint (this took a long time, but it did too when I used a gas one), separate rocks out of soil, and used it to help dig out tree stumps.

reviews.review_header: Excellent value for home cleaning. Great power for an electric washer.
reviews.review_text: Excellent pressure washer! I wasn't sure whether this would have plenty of pressure for chores around the house but this unit works fantastic and has great power. What an advantage not having to worry about gas or oil. Highly recommend.

After quite a bit of research..bought this unit. It's fairly high powered for an electrical unit without going commercial. I dont' care for the gas units as they never seem to work with the occasional usage I have. Have only used it once but it performed to my expectations. Water hookup didn't leak like many other units seem to. Hope it lasts.

reviews.review_header: Very pleased with this pressure washer
reviews.review_text: I've only used it once but it was very easy to use, lightweight, powerful enough to do what I needed, cleaning off driveway, removing mildew from the side of our brick house. Looking forward to using it again.

This is my third pressure washer. The previous were Karcher and Snap-On. Both worked for about 1 year and then the main pressure tank started leaking. This one worked out of the box and seemed to be better quality than the Snap-On. No issues not leaks and the it did a good job. Just hope it lasts more than 1 year.

This is a good power washer for the money. It comes with two power wands that easily twist and slide into the handle. The hose reel and the attachable accessory holder are designed poorly. The wands won't stay attached and It is better to just wrap the hose around the handle.

reviews.review_header: I've had this for about 1.5 years still going strong
reviews.review_text: Despite other reviews I've never had any problems with any parts breaking. I've been pretty careful with it, so maybe that's why. It's pretty powerful for an electric. Does the job for small cleaning jobs. Would buy again or recommend to anyone looking for a cheap affordable electric power washer.

A valuable purchase and while this is not an industrial strength washer it did every job as advertised. The stability of the unit is good but care needs to be taken to avoid tips. As a 70 year old woman I found this product to be usable for me. Price was competitive
Easy to set up and easy to use. Performed as advertised. Pleased with the overall design, operation and performance of the pressure washer. I hope that this initial satisfaction holds up over time.

Works great once you get it assembled. The adapter for the water hose does not attach well, so there is always leaking at the joint, but this doesn't affect operations. The same problem applies to the threads of the sprayer hose which attaches to the lower left portion of the body. It attaches well but not easily, taking precise alignment before the threads align properly. Otherwise, very portable and easy to use.

Used this to power wash the house and driveway. I've owned a few of power washers and they usually don't last. I researched for a while and this was the best as far as reviews and my price range. Yes, I would buy it again.

Arrived before the delivery date. Easy to assemble. Cleans very well. The leak at the hose attachment reported by some (and what I also experienced) is easily solved by fully seating the washer. I've use AR Blue Clean for about 2 hours now. I plan to use it as much as I can before the return window closes because of the reported dissatisfaction.

This works great for deck, brick and pavement cleaning. I bought it with the intention of using it for my house exterior, but that turns out to be more of a jog than I feel qualified to do. I didn't use the detergent, so I can't be sure of the effectiveness, but just using the water did not really clean my white aluminum siding well.

This washer is working just right. Cleaned the whole house no problem. Cleaned the trucks no problem. Absolutely works as it is supposed to and keeps working after setting away for a time. I am very happy with this washer. They have such a good price and you receive them very quickly. I recommend to all.

reviews.review_header: Excellent pressure washer for the money!
reviews.review_text: Read many of the previous reviews on Amazon before I purchased this unit. Was not disappointed. Only criticism is the hose real which really is for storage only. Would rather wrap around and hang over unit due to the fact that the entire hose length must be uncoiled in order to use the unit and do not want to bother to coil and uncoil on the reel.

reviews.review_header: This is a nice unit but like others
reviews.review_text: This is a nice unit but like others, I developed a leak at the connector. Hard to believe a company would not correct this when it was brought to their attention. I suppose I can get a new adaptor at one of my local big box stores.

reviews.review_header: Spend another 50 bucks.. Get the better one.
reviews.review_text: You pay for what you get. I used this washer twice. I bought it solely for vehicle washing, cleaning the driveway of oil stains from DIY changes and flushes. Pressure is good, time it takes for it to build is good. Thats where this units greatness ends. The wand accessories are dewflotchy for lack of a better word; You're never quite sure if you've got it locked in unless you give it a hard tug. The foamer/detergent bottle is an utter piece of garbage. Infact, it damaged my car when the pressed in nozzle tip came flying off under pressure on the second use and put a dime sized dent in my car. It eats through soap like a fatman at a free all you can eat. The hose reel is horrible. The idea was there, they just didnt execute it correctly. Once again, lack of a better and actual word, the reel was dewflotchy. Its an utter pain to get it on there correctly and straight anreeling it on while reeling or spooling. Last but not least, the washer broke on the brass end that connects to the bottom of the hose. On my third attempt at using the unit, im half way through washing my car when im suddenly sprayed with pressured water from the bottom of the wand. On inspection, the rubber o ring washer that goies on the brass tube had split. Three uses. Two month period. Dont waste your time or money.. Spend 50.00 or 60.00 more.

reviews.review_header: Meets my needs around the house
reviews.review_text: This pressure washer is everything I expected it to be, great for cleaning cars and around the house, some of the construction seems to be a bit light, but I would recommend it to a friend, just remember it is a 1900 psi electric power washer, so I'd recommend confirming it will meet your needs before purchasing

reviews.review_header: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my dad ...
reviews.review_text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my dad and he loves it. It is lightweight and works well to clean the stone and wood patio and sides of the shed.

reviews.review_header: Received and had bad hose connection
reviews.review_text: Received and had bad hose connection. Leaked water constantly. Soap gun leaked badly. Started to surge after several times use.
My water pressure is better than this machine. It was also cheaper at Rural King locally The price was 89usd.

I have never used a pressure washer before, so I was not sure if an electric washer would work well enough. It does work very well. However the plastic hose connections look very flimsy, and I won't be surprised if they break off just from normal use. I would suggest the input and output hose connections be made of a more durable metal.

Cleaned my stone pavers that were not cleaned for 30 years, very well and quickly. All parts disconnect quickly and easily for neat storage on the main body. Good for washing car with the milder of the two wands. Also good for PVC fences, pavers/patios, lawn furniture,etc.
Love the way it removes the spider webs on the outside of the windows.
After only a couple of uses the water sprays all over from the handle.

reviews.review_header: Now I can cut cost on pretty much everything house painting and car cleaning
reviews.review_text: Aw this thing rocks!!! Now I can cut cost on pretty much everything house painting and car cleaning. It's easy to use and it's compactness makes that much greater👍👍👍
Worth every penny! Worked great for stripping stain off my deck and cleaning up the concrete. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_header: Light weight & powerful This pressure washer is great for big or little jobs
reviews.review_text: Light weight & powerful This pressure washer is great for big or little jobs

I was looking for a pressure washer to do most of my homeowner cleaning needs. I have owned a gasoline 2500 psi power washer and had many engine problems. I was pleasantly surprized when I found the electric motor AR Blue Clean AR383. It has more power than expected and can handle most jobs. If you treat it with care this washer works just fine. For the price you can't beat it.

This is my first experience with a pressure washer, but so far, it serves my purposes. I tried it yesterday on my an old cement walkway and was amazed to see the grime and moss vanish in minutes. This seems plenty powerful for simple, home cleaning tasks.
I love this thing! Used it to power wash my stamped concrete patio prior to sealing. It worked great. Definitely get the circular attachment to save time. I want to power wash everything now.

reviews.review_header: Not great quality as far as hose bib.
reviews.review_text: Only used twice and the hose connector blew off the hose...work was stalled...still had to pay the workers...not happy as I am not able to return or lodge a complaint to get the piece replaced.
Small unit, but works great for jobs around the house. I mainly use to power wash the rocks in my water feature in the back yard. Easy to use and plenty of power

reviews.review_header: For the price I didn't expect it to be perfect. I saw what could happen and has happened ...
reviews.review_text: For the price I didn't expect it to be perfect. I saw what could happen and has happened to others. But I used it for hours and I haven't had a problem. Maybe after long term use there may be an issue but I happy.
Hose blew off after a couple of times using it. The house reel is pointless. You have to completely disconnect the hose every time you want to reel it up.

reviews.review_header: So far so good - 3 days use and going well
reviews.review_text: Only had it a few days and so far so good - would have scored more if the plastic connectors were replaced with something a little more sturdy as I fear they will break if the unit is accidentally tipped over - otherwise there is plenty of power for jobs around the yard and my patio is looking good as a result
Bought this for myself for Mothers Day! Best gift ever... My drivewaY looks amazing...
Works great! Arrived on time!! Cleans my brick like a charm! Would recommend to friends!

reviews.review_header: great product Easy to use and very effective on driveway ...
reviews.review_text: great product Easy to use and very effective on driveway and house. thank you!
Works better than my previous washer, meets expectations in cleaning my concrete driveway. However, it but it cost twice as much. Hope it last. Two of my neighbours bout the identical machine.

reviews.review_header: There is nothing finer than being able to work on an old tractor ...
reviews.review_text: There is nothing finer than being able to work on an old tractor AFTER it has been cleaned. This is about as simple and effective a pressure washer as can be found and had enough pressure to knock old dirt and grease off so the bolts could be found.

reviews.review_header: Works great, have had it for almost a year with no major issues.
reviews.review_text: The unit is lightweight and easy to move. It has a variety of included attachments and good power for an electrical pressure washer. Like others have mentioned, the high-pressure hose that runs from the unit to the spray-gun tangles easily and is hard to manage as you move around.
I am not an expert in pressure washers but this is much better than my old el-cheapo model. It is a pleasure to use. I called the company before my purchase and they were helpful and pleasant.
One of my favorite new "toys" that allows me to clean the deck, driveway and cars. Really is a BLAST!

reviews.review_header: an excellent machine easy to use and did a great job ...
reviews.review_text: an excellent machine easy to use and did a great job I would recommend this machine to anyone that wants to buy a pressure washer.

I did my research on Amazon before buying an electric pressure washer. I thought this one WAS the one. But after unpacking, assembling, then turning it on, I got an unpleasant surprise. TWO things were wrong, the first probably correctable with a call to the manufacturer's customer service, and the second I suspect was more in the nature of a design defect that I didn't want to have to contend with in the coming months and years. First, the small problem: One of the wand attachments that came with the unit didn't make a tight fit with the part of the handle to which it was supposed to attach. The consequence? Low water pressure, and a VERY leaky high pressure hose. I compared it to the wand attachment that DID fit well, and the two were NOT the same. Lack of inspection? Draw your own conclusions. Second, the possible design defect: The high pressure hose attaches to a "gun" through a coupling, which is held in place with a spring. The spring is SO WEAK, that the high pressure of the water, combined with the normal movement of the hose during use, caused the high pressure water hose to come detached from the gun, creating an H2O mess which sent me scrambling for both the power switch and the water spigot cutoff valve. No fun. The GOOD news? For the few seconds that it DID work with the wand that fit, the thing kicked butt. So, I'm off to the wild blue yonder of Amazon search and/or the Internet to look for another unit, maybe a gasoline-powered unit that costs a bit more. I live in the SF Bay area, and I hate to spew petroleum carbons into the air if I can help it, but....

reviews.review_header: Medium power accomplishes many tasks easily
reviews.review_text: Washing the car, cleaning concrete, lawn furniture, bird feeders, the deck, driveway and porches - works just fine. I bring it inside in the winter so it doesn't freeze. Has served me well. You'll need to replace the small o-rings in a couple of years. Even did a decent job blowing out drain pipe.
Excellent power washer for the money. Small and light easy to handle. I had a expensive Karcher power washer and this one is just as effective. I highly recommend it for the home owner.

reviews.review_header: Used 3 times then quit working. Lasted about 15 months...less than 2 hours total use time.
reviews.review_text: Found a broken part right out of the box...was shipped broken. Notified dealer and after several phone calls they replaced the part. Then, the hose would not always stay connected to the gun. Then, the third time I used it, while holding the hose in one hand, I touched the electrical cord with the other hand and felt a small electrical current. Then, when I went to use it the 4th time, the pressure started dropping and smoke started coming out of the motor. That was it for me. Of course, it was no longer under warranty. A piece of junk. Save up your money and buy a different, better one. Follow up on this product: After contacting the manufacturer of this product to make them aware of the sprayer's problems, the manufacturer told me they would replace the unit eventhough it was 6 months out of warranty. After sending them a copy of the original receipt, a new sprayer was sent at no cost. Still, I don't recommend this product because of my initial experience with the first one. Too many problems in too short of a time. Maybe others have had better luck though.

Works really well. On advice of others, I did purchase a brass connector (female to female)for the input water supply - have no idea how the supplied connector works, but it works great with the after market one. The hose reel is a waste of time - you probably will not use that, as you would need to disconnect the hose to wind it on, and that's more trouble than it is worth.
This pressure washer is great. My husband pulled it out of box, plugged it in, and turned on the water. Super easy to use. So much so that we all fought over who got to use it.

reviews.review_header: this is great. Very satisfied with my purchase
reviews.review_text: This power washer had power and then some. Compared to my previous unit, this is great. Very satisfied with my purchase. To make the job easier on driveways and patios, use the Flat Surface Cleaner attachment. What a great combo!

I am extremely pleased with this pressure washer. I am an older woman and tackle most of my household cleanup jobs myself and this product was very easy to use. It was very easy for me to assemble and made cleaning my fence, patio and driveway and fun experience. I would recommend this pressure washer to anyone.

Easy to put together, no leaks, quiet when it's powered on but not being used. Only trouble I had was that the foaming attachment didn't really spray to my expectations but this could have been due to the cleaning solution I used. Overall pretty good!

reviews.review_header: Seems dumb they don't include a couple of gaskets
reviews.review_text: Was missing a gasket where it connects to the hose; once we figured that out and took the one out of another hose we were up and running. Seems dumb they don't include a couple of gaskets.

reviews.review_header: Great biut leaks alot of water
reviews.review_text: This is a great machine, It is extremely powerful; HOWEVER, as many others have mentioned it leaks an enormous amount of water when hooked up. I purchased the recommended brass connector with the hopes it would help out but unfortunately it has not.
It is very good and quiet. The water pressure is great for washing cars too. I recommend this product.
Worked great. Used it to clean my house with no problems. It did a nice job.

After read some reviews, I decided to buy this Pressure Washer since so many people have used it. Easy to assembly and use and I don't see any leaking problems at all. It is a very powerful pressure washer and I functional well. I use it to clean stucco wall, wood deck, even for area rugs. I highly recommend it to all home owners.

reviews.review_header: Efficient, works well, good price, ergonomic, can't ask more than that. .
reviews.review_text: I have only used couple of time, it works very well, cleaned my wood fence and back yard concrete from the green stuff cumulated throughout the years. the price was good, I highly recommend it.

So far so good. I have no problems with my new power washer. It's easy to get started and use. I had a gas powered washer but find using the electic much more friendy. No gas to mess with, just plug it in and you are ready to get to work. Has enough power for my needs, washing the cars and cleaning around the house. The only thing I can think of that would have been a better deal is if were free.
Love this little guy. Amazing power from a light and small pressure cleaner. Can't compare to the gas powered cousins. However, it gets the job done just as well.

reviews.review_header: Works great. Could use a bit more pressure for what ...
reviews.review_text: Works great. Could use a bit more pressure for what I do, but it serves the purpose. Be warned however everything is made of plastic, don't figure it would last long. Hopefully it proves me wrong.

Worked very well to clean the paint off of my deck. I am sure it will be nice to have around the house for many other purposes in the future. As others have said, it's obviously not a professional grade washer, but I think its great for the average homeowner. I would recommend it to others in my situation.

reviews.review_header: This is a good buy but getting comfortable with the design of the ...
reviews.review_text: I have had 2 previous Karcher units. This is a good buy but getting comfortable with the design of the wand will take time. The hose reel is more of a nuisance than a benefit. Good unit... good buy but give me the Karcher

I have only used this unit a few times. It works really well for small jobs such as washing a car or cleaning a porch/patio. It works well enough to do bigger jobs like siding or driveways but it will take some time to complete these larger tasks because this unit doesn't have enough power/pressure to do these jobs quickly. I like my unit alot and for an electric unit it has alot of options .
Takes car of all task with ease. Simple to use and very quite.

reviews.review_header: This has only been used once but so far does just as good a job as the more powerful one
reviews.review_text: I had a larger gas operated washer which was hard to start. This has only been used once but so far does just as good a job as the more powerful one. I have also purchased one for my sister.

reviews.review_header: Lessons learned: act quickly to return and get refund; don't focus on your own need to complete outdoor seasonal task
reviews.review_text: On 2nd day of use I could not get wand out of trigger gun. I looked at troubleshooting tips provided by manufacturer. I had other people try to get wand out also and they couldn't get it out. Frustrated I went to local big box storeS to buy items to power wash my house. It was beginning of September and I needed to complete the task quickly before cooler seasonal weather started. I completed the task BUT NOT WITH THIS POWER WASHER.Unfortunately for me, I didn't send it back quickly so I missed the Sept 29 date for return eligibility. Now I am stuck with a non-functioning power washer pLus no refund ($160) and I had the additional cost of purchasing items to get the job done. Lesson Learned: Act quickly to get replacement or refund. I was more concerned with getting job done than Amazon deadlines. I have Amazon prime and have enjoyed it. However, as I am purchasing my Christmas gifts I need to re-think my purchasing choices...online or local. Hope this helps others that procrastinate and tend to focus on the task (why you purchased the item in the first place).

Just spent hours with this machine. Works like charm. Perfect for cleaning cement driveways. What I really like about this pressure washer is the size. I've been through several pressure washers and this one is smaller and lighter than the others, which help when needing to store it away. I also like how all the attachments store neatly on the back.
I usually do research before I buy stuff but this one I read that a lot of people review that it leaks but mine doesnt. And I clean and painted my deck and was the outside of the house. I love it.

reviews.review_header: Best pressure washer I have owned to date
reviews.review_text: Washed my house two days after receipt and had no problems at all. Pressure was more than sufficient and use of machine was easy. Only down side I had was the location of the on/off button was awkward to reach. Would prefer a switch. Would purchase again.

Assembly was relatively easy with the instructions. It is light weight and worked great, I also purchased the 10" deck, patio & flat surface cleaner attachment and certainly did speed up the time it took to clean my patio and drive. Very happy with this product

Unit was easy to assemble and quiet yet pretty powerful. Plenty of pressure for my home usage on patio and outdoor furniture. The hose and electrical chords are nice and long so didn't have to strain to reach a long way. I did have to use it with out the filter section on the hose inlet as I could not get water to run through it. Also the directions are not the best. All in all a great machine for the money.

for me this is the perfect power washer - it's light weight, which makes it easy to move around, and has enough pressure for the jobs I need done - cleaning sidewalks, siding, fence and car to name a few. The other thing I like is the cord and hose wind up fairly easy.

reviews.review_header: It was very easy to unpack and assemble attachments
reviews.review_text: It was very easy to unpack and assemble attachments. I have used it to remove stains and mold on lanai and it works great. Plenty of power and built with little weight so it is easy to move from one area to another. No doubt this product is a winner!
I'm a 110 lb female and had no trouble putting it together or using it. Did a great job on my two decks, screened porch, garage door, gutters car, and front stoop. Good value for money so far

I was skeptical after unpacking this piece of plastic, but it does a terrific job. I powerwashed my entire house (vinyl siding) that was badly discolored in many places, and it got all the stains out without the use of any solvents or detergents. Great little unit!
Bought for Father's Day, my husband loves it. It works very well with the included parts so far.
This one does the job for normal household stuff. It nicely cleaned the driveway; however, it works better with the brush. I highly recommend the AR blue scrub brush to make the cleaning easy.

reviews.review_header: Works well and is lighter than my old unit with ...
reviews.review_text: Works well and is lighter than my old unit with a little more PSI. Not crazy about the storage for the hose, power cord and extensions, but manageable. My old unit had a neat compartment that all the pieces fit securely.

reviews.review_header: not good for clearing moss from driverway.
reviews.review_text: it is a good tool to wash your car but not good to remove moss from your driveway. to clear moss from driveway you have to adjust the spay to the smallest dot to gain highest pressure. which is very low effecient.

reviews.review_header: Best part, unlike other power washers
reviews.review_text: Incredible power washer. Does all it claims to do and more. Very powerful. Best part, unlike other power washers, you can order replacement parts. Highly recommend.

When I purchased this product, I was a little hesistant since I never heard of it. It is awesome. I like how portable it is and works very well. I also purchase an extra washer since I read the previous comments on how the water gets everywhere while pressure cleaning. I recommend this product to everyone. It is good for the driveways, walls and even cars.
Awesome little pressure washer. Its been great for power washing the driveway, fence, and patio. I'm very Satisfied with this product.

Never before had a pressure washer, so I really did not know what to expect. I was concerned that 1900 PSI would not be strong enough to clean my concrete patio. (A build-up of several years mold/mildew, etc.) Not to worry! Plenty of cleaning pressure. Worked well on my wooden deck, too. Good price; works good. Very satisfied!

Bought this on other reviews that were positive and was not disappointed! It worked well on my deck and patio furniture, recommend using a cleaner first on your deck before power washing . Used it twice now so can't say how dependable it will be but like it so far!

reviews.review_header: Very happy with the way it took mold off my front ...
reviews.review_text: Very happy with the way it took mold off my front porch. Sure beats scrubbing with a brush. Next I will try on a shed that is very moldy and needs to be painted.

reviews.review_header: This was my first pressure washer and it works great for everything I need
reviews.review_text: This was my first pressure washer and it works great for everything I need. Very compact and light weight. The 2 wands allow for a wide range of adjustment. I haven't had any leaks like some have stated.

.I bought this one to replace an older gas model that was 3000 PSI. Gas model work great however it had to be serviced quite often about once a year. This electric model has been fantastic no issues. I keep finding new things to power wash it's fantastic.

Love the wands that adjust easily to any needed stream. Strong steady water pressure. Used this to clean sidewalks, wood deck, gutters and soffit ( light pressure for these areas). Found this unit excellent choice. Like everything made, has plastic handle and connectors so ill store inside to prevent freezing and cracking.

reviews.review_header: I use this thing to wash the sidewalk, car ...
reviews.review_text: I use this thing to wash the sidewalk, car, house. Generally speaking it works but I don't know about that hose real. Doesn't seem to work or otherwise it's not worth the fuss using.
pretty cheap and delicate.
There is no power with this machine. The only thing it is good for is to wash the car, didn't clean the siding on my house, and did not clean my deck or patio.

reviews.review_header: Great Pressure Washer at a great price.
reviews.review_text: We did a lot of research, and it paid off. This turned out to be the perfect pressure washer for our needs. It's portable, easy to use, and most important, it doesn't leak at all the seams like some of the cheaper models. Very happy we chose this one.
father's day gift to me. works great on patio, sidewalks, stones, bricks, concrete retaining wall, trash cans, doggie swimming pool and cars! have used it a lot in just a month.
Made of lightweight plastics. I am seriously concerned about how well this will hold up over the years.

reviews.review_header: My husband loves this. He pressure washed the house ...
reviews.review_text: My husband loves this. He pressure washed the house, the driveway, the patios, and even washed my car. There are various settings, the smaller the stream the more power it puts out so be careful.

Bought for husband to take to cottage; he tried it out at home and loves it so much he wants one for home and one for lake cottage. He also has a large gas pressure washer and said this one is just as good if not better than the much larger and expensive gas unit.

I've had the chance to use this pressure washer a few times since ordering, and it works great. Assembly instructions are clear, and the parts are high quality. There is no leaking. The soap dispenser also works very well, and is easy to fill and clean since it's detachable. If you're looking for a no-nonsense, light-to-moderate use washer, this one is perfect.

reviews.review_header: Not as powerful as I had hoped. Did an ...
reviews.review_text: Not as powerful as I had hoped. Did an ok job, took repeated swipes to do the job completely

Good value for money. Works very good for all residential purposes. You can use heavy duty outdoor extension cords if you need more length. I have not yet used the optional round surface cleaner attachment as I had difficulty in attaching it.

This little guy packs a punch. I have a screened pool and front porch. They along with my drive way and sidewalk turn black pretty quick. This machine makes short work of it. I highly recommend the separate driveway attachment for large flat surface cleaning.
It works great on my boat; it took 3 years worth of crud off, no problem. The auto shut-off feature is nice, as well as the multiple nozzles. Overall, I'm very happy with it.

So far put only ~10 hrs on it. Very pleased. It's light, powerful and quiet - the motor's sound is about equal to the sound of the water hitting the patio surface. Less annoying to neighbors I hope than the previous electric pressure washer I was using.
Good so far. Used it on several occasions to wash the car and sidewalk. Easy to use and set up. Just wish the actual hose was a bit longer than what it is but knew it upfront.

reviews.review_header: Works well. Unfortunate also bought Karcher attachment which doesnt ...
reviews.review_text: Works well. Unfortunate also bought Karcher attachment which doesnt fit this brand. Dont mix and match!#

reviews.review_header: Perfect for a Variety of Household Chores
reviews.review_text: After buying two other brands (and returning them due to poor performance and or construction) I purchased this based on the positive reviews. It is very well constructed and powerful enough to clean concrete and siding. I am very happy with my purchase.
Did not even last a day! Cheap attachment where the hose fits broke right away.
Very good light powerful enough to do my fence and other projects good buy

Good little unit. The only reason I give 4 stars is because of the way the power cord wraps around the back and the soap dispenser seems a bit clunky. For the power cord you have to disconnect the host to properly wrap it in the holder it has.

I was amazed at how the washer removed black mold from my walkway and driveway. Although it was slow work, it cleaned off the mold which would not be removed by brush and detergent. It also took off a green mold off a window sill.
I absolutely love it!!! So much easier to use than my gas washer, and it's also quieter. I can move it to the deck by myself with no problem and it does a great cleaning job.

Overall a good product. The wand is just too short. Kills my back after using it because you have to bend over. They need to fix that issue before I'll recommend it to someone else. Oh, and the solution bottle that came with it. Junk. Cord's hard to rewind. The thing's probably not worth more than a hundred bucks.

This is my first pressure washer and I was very impressed with its performance. Had a few years worth of mold build up on back cement patio/deck. Turned on the AR 383 (do not turn on power until after you turn on hose, you will damage pump) and it easily cleaned a 10' x 20' deck in about 2hrs. Would purchase this again, without a doubt.
Works great for the price. The hose reel is pointless, and the plastic hose connector makes me nervous, but have run it for about 10 hours now and it got the job done.

Was really happy with performance. Did a great job on my driveway and patio. Had read reviews that electric motors on some shut off after 30 minutes. So being new I didn't push it that hard. I needed a break after 20 minutes anyhow!! Very easy to use. Quieter than gas. Just great!!

This worked very well for getting the winter dirt off my porch, deck and railings with minimal effort. The reviews complained about the plastic connection and they were right so we bought the brass hose fitting and no more leaks. The washer did what was expected and was easy to use. Great washer for the price.
awesome design for storage. hose adapter breaks easily though. be careful! works well overall.

Cleaned the whole front sidewalk and driveway with this, as well as the back patio. Lots of fun to watch the dark spots just disappear. Toward the end of usage the other day, the circular spray attachment was behaving weirdly. I'll have to see if that continues, or starts working normally again.

The washer itself is good, but it's built cheep in other areas, the spool is worthless, I got so tired of fooling with the spool, now I just wrap the hose around the machine,and the connector where the garden hose connects to the washer is cheep, I keep waiting on it to break, I just hope I can find a replacement.

This pressure washer is quite and. Puts out good pressure. Where the problem is in the tip it's supposed to be adjustable from jet to fan but it goes from jet to jet. If it had a better gun and nozzle I would have gave it five stars.

It has a lot of pressure and does a good job cleaning. Some people say they had a problem with it leaking but mine didn't leak a drop and I didn't buy an extra fitting for it. I am well pleased with it.

The electrical connection did not work. Also, the connection from hose to machine, leaked. Not just a small leak, it sprayed all over me and anything else near by. I am disappointed with this purchase. I was looking forward to using it too!

reviews.review_header: don't like the hose it's specific to this brand and you ...
reviews.review_text: Decent little pressure washer , don't like the hose it's specific to this brand and you will have to purchase a new hose or adapters for any attachments . Other than that it's a good buy.

Works fabulous. We wash our cars, our garage and our driveway. It has a lot of power so we don't need to go to the car wash. Works just as good or better. It has the soap dispenser that will soap the car up and different angle wands for different sprays. Good investment.

reviews.review_header: Plenty of power and easy to use
reviews.review_text: I got this for my deck and it worked perfectly. I was thinking about replacing the deck, but after using this and and a stain/sealer, it looks brand new. I also used it on a concrete patio and aluminum siding, and they look great now too.

reviews.review_header: AR Blue Clean Electric Pressure Washer is a Great Buy!
reviews.review_text: I was pleased with the pressure that this AR Blue Clean puts out. It made my deck look like new! It was easy to use and light weight without the noise of a gas powered machine.

reviews.review_header: Good size for me as I am senior citizen
reviews.review_text: Many family members have also borrowed it. Good size for me as I am senior citizen.

I like these little electric pressure washers. Much quieter and lighter than the large gas ones. It will do almost any job you need around most homes. From washing the car to getting moss off walkways.

reviews.review_header: I saw some people worry about the plastic connection for ...
reviews.review_text: I saw some people worry about the plastic connection for the garden hose. I haven't experienced any leaking issues there yet in the somewhat limited amount of usage I've had.

works well. It doesn't have high pressure but I did not feel the need for that anyway. It has been used twice since I bought it and it did what I asked of it, without any problems. Maybe a little noisy but otherwise, a good purchase.

It's a nice product for washing cars and small areas but doesn't have the capacity to wash large areas. Don't have to put up with the noise, much higher cost and hassle of a more powerful gasoline driven unit. Only used it once since purchase, so I'll reserve any further comments for the future.
We Love This Item, Is An Great Product NICE !!!!!

I did take everyone's advice in the previous reviews and I swapped out the plastic fittings to brass fittings and use plumber's tape. I have not had any leaks; thereby, no loss in pressure. It is a great purchase for the price!!! I would highly recommend it to my friends and family!!!

I looked at many reviews before selecting this pressure washer. I should have believed the bad ones. Plastic fittings are cheap and leak. I replaced them with brass and stopped most leaking. I tested the unit on a concrete part of my driveway. After a few minutes with the "Adjustable Wand" the end of the wand was blown off by the pressure. It would not thread back on the wand. Inspection showed a 1" piece of plastic thread inside which had been torn off or cut by the pressure. removal of the debris allowed the nozzle cover to be reattached. After a few minutes the unit started sputtering and changing pressure output. A couple of times it even shut off and restarted. It was as if it could not get enough water, but I have 90- PSI and a 3/4" hose supplying it . Also no extension cord and plugged into a 20 amp circuit. So not power related. I have been a contractor for many years and have had several pressure washers. This one was for my wife so she would not have to start a gas unit. Price is important and I shopped price. If you make a product you can not cut the price by using material so cheap as to render the product useless. The wands are pretty cheap. I suspect some of the reviews are imposters.

reviews.review_header: So far it has been great, I worked it for 3/4 hours straight and ...
reviews.review_text: So far it has been great, I worked it for 3/4 hours straight and it did not let me down, has enough power to clean any and all my back yard jobs. If it give me a few years of this kind of service it will be worth every penney. Thank you.

reviews.review_header: Good work for a short time.
reviews.review_text: Worked good for a short while. Did not last two years and is not repairable. Doesn't seem to be a good model in comparison to other models.

I love it! It is lightweight and easy to assemble, hook up and use. It is small enough to store almost anywhere. It has plenty of power to do the jobs I need to do - clean my walkways, clean outdoor wooden furniture, wash my car, etc. My only criticism (and it is certainly not a deal breaker) is that it would be easier to move around if the handle were taller.
This works great. It washed away mold & mildew on my granite steps and despite claims removed peeling pint from pressure treated lumber with ease.

reviews.review_header: The pressure washer works ok, however the on/off switch ...
reviews.review_text: The pressure washer works ok, however the on/off switch is very difficult to operate making the unit somewhat unsafe. I would rather pay a couple bucks extra and have a washer that's more user friendly.
Great entry level pressure washer! I use it for washing my car mostly. I also use the AR foam cannon and they make my weekly car wash a breeze! Cant beat the price as well. $150 for 1900psi.

Received the AR Blue Clean AR383 pressure washer in good time.. A nice looking and easy to assemble piece of equipment and it works very well...It may not seem like such a big deal but they sent no screws to assemble the tool holder assembly to the unit. Was frustrating to me....I am pleased with the way the unit performed while doing my decks and sidewalks and vehicles.......Don
works great took a few minutes to lear how to work it, but did not read instructions
So far so good I have used this a few times and it has worked to my likeing

I don't normally give a review this quick but in this case, I will cause I'm loving this pressure washer a lot. It powerful enough to clean the dirt and grime on my driveway and is an excellent machine for cleaning cars. I didn't take the change on this machine and bought the extended warranty just in case.
Cord design/recoil does not work Until worked for about a year then quit. Look somewhere else. CHEAP!
This worked great when my husband washed our deck. It looks great.

I've had the pressure washer for 1 year. The cheap plastic connectors repeatedly break, requiring a call to customer service for replacement. While the company has a great CS dept, after several failed parts I have given up.

reviews.review_header: Nice device. Cared for properly should last
reviews.review_text: Nice device. Cared for properly should last. Quiet smooth sounding pump motor. Hi pressure hose spool is too difficult to use....just coil the line and hang on carry handle.
I've had a little over a year now and still works great for light household use.
Not too big, not too small --- can't wait for the weather to break so I can use it some more -

reviews.review_header: Cleaning is its job and this machine does it extremely well!!!!!!!!!
reviews.review_text: I thought the rating on this item was very thought provoking. I was even more pleased when I started cleaning my pool decking after many years of neglect. The machine is excellent. I had a fun time placing all the items together and it was nice to have an entire system on one platform. I even bought a few 50 foot super hoses of which one is just for the washer. I have that on the handle too. I think this machine is as good as anyone could ever need to maintain their home. I especially liked the way the system totally shuts down leaving the trigger off. No compressor running, no water leaking. It becomes totally silent so you could even answer a cell phone easily!!! I also cleaned my entire screened in porch which is right next to the pool and my water bill was only 2 dollars higher than the month before. The electric was about 4 dollars higher but is hard to compare because it was much warmer the month I used the system. My assumption was 2 to 3 dollars because I like my home warm here in Florida at 84 degrees. I use ac just to keep it dry inside and have no problem with heat at all. I only used water and no cleaning chemicals which is even nicer. I will redo it again this year with a little bleach to get a few togher stains out. The machine cleaned everything I expected it to in about 3 hours of heavy use and the decks and porch is lovely as when it was 25 years newer.
